Appendix A Proofs for the Surrogate œïitalic-œï\phiitalic_œï

Theorem 1 (Curvature of the Polyak surrogate).

Let f‚Å¢(x)ùëìùë•f(x)italic_f ( italic_x ) be convex and define ùê±‚ãÜ‚ààargminùê±f‚Å¢(ùê±)superscriptùê±‚ãÜsubscriptargminùê±ùëìùê±\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\in\mathop{\mathrm{argmin}}_{\boldsymbol{x}}\ f(% \boldsymbol{x})bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚àà roman_argmin start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_f ( bold_italic_x ). Define œï‚Å¢(ùê±)=12‚Å¢(f‚Å¢(ùê±)‚àíf‚Å¢(ùê±‚ãÜ))2italic-œïùê±12superscriptùëìùê±ùëìsuperscriptùê±‚ãÜ2\phi(\boldsymbol{x})=\frac{1}{2}(f(\boldsymbol{x})-f(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}))^% {2}italic_œï ( bold_italic_x ) = divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ( italic_f ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_f ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT. Then, we have

  • ‚Ä¢

    œïitalic-œï\phiitalic_œï is ‚Äñùíàùíö‚Äñ2superscriptnormsubscriptùíàùíö2\|\boldsymbol{g}_{\boldsymbol{y}}\|^{2}‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_y end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT-LSUC around any ùíöùíö\boldsymbol{y}bold_italic_y for any ùíàùíö‚àà‚àÇf‚Å¢(ùíö)subscriptùíàùíöùëìùíö\boldsymbol{g}_{\boldsymbol{y}}\in\partial f(\boldsymbol{y})bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_y end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚àà ‚àÇ italic_f ( bold_italic_y ).

  • ‚Ä¢

    If fùëìfitalic_f is sùë†sitalic_s-sharp, then œïitalic-œï\phiitalic_œï has s2superscriptùë†2s^{2}italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT-quadratic growth.

  • ‚Ä¢

    If fùëìfitalic_f has Œºùúá\muitalic_Œº-quadratic growth and LùêøLitalic_L-self bounded, then œïitalic-œï\phiitalic_œï satisfies a local quadratic growth:

    œï‚Å¢(ùíô)‚â•12‚Å¢Œº‚Å¢‚Äñùíà‚Äñ22‚Å¢L‚Å¢‚Äñùíô‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2,‚àÄùíà‚àà‚àÇf‚Å¢(ùíô).formulae-sequenceitalic-œïùíô12ùúásuperscriptnormùíà22ùêøsuperscriptnormùíôsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ2for-allùíàùëìùíô\phi(\boldsymbol{x})\geq\frac{1}{2}\frac{\mu\|\boldsymbol{g}\|^{2}}{2L}\|% \boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2},\ \forall\boldsymbol{g}\in\partial f% (\boldsymbol{x})~{}.italic_œï ( bold_italic_x ) ‚â• divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG divide start_ARG italic_Œº ‚à• bold_italic_g ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_L end_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , ‚àÄ bold_italic_g ‚àà ‚àÇ italic_f ( bold_italic_x ) .
Proof.
œïitalic-œï\displaystyle\phiitalic_œï (ùíö)‚àíœï‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ)‚àí‚ü®‚àáœï‚Å¢(ùíö),ùíô‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚ü©+12‚Å¢‚Äñùíàùíö‚Äñ2‚Å¢‚Äñ‚àáœï‚Å¢(ùíö)‚Äñ22ùíöitalic-œïsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ‚àáitalic-œïùíöùíôsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ12superscriptnormsubscriptùíàùíö2subscriptsuperscriptnorm‚àáitalic-œïùíö22\displaystyle(\boldsymbol{y})-\phi(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})-\langle\nabla\phi(% \boldsymbol{y}),\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\rangle+\frac{1}{2\|% \boldsymbol{g}_{\boldsymbol{y}}\|^{2}}\|\nabla\phi(\boldsymbol{y})\|^{2}_{2}( bold_italic_y ) - italic_œï ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) - ‚ü® ‚àá italic_œï ( bold_italic_y ) , bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ü© + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 ‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_y end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ‚à• ‚àá italic_œï ( bold_italic_y ) ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
=12‚Å¢(f‚Å¢(ùíö)‚àíf‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ))2‚àí(f‚Å¢(ùíö)‚àíf‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ))‚Å¢‚ü®ùíàùíö,ùíö‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚ü©+12‚Å¢‚Äñùíàùíö‚Äñ2‚Å¢‚Äñ‚àáœï‚Å¢(ùíö)‚Äñ2absent12superscriptùëìùíöùëìsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ2ùëìùíöùëìsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜsubscriptùíàùíöùíösuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ12superscriptnormsubscriptùíàùíö2superscriptnorm‚àáitalic-œïùíö2\displaystyle=\frac{1}{2}(f(\boldsymbol{y})-f(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}))^{2}-(f(% \boldsymbol{y})-f(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}))\langle\boldsymbol{g}_{\boldsymbol{y% }},\boldsymbol{y}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\rangle+\frac{1}{2\|\boldsymbol{g}_{% \boldsymbol{y}}\|^{2}}\|\nabla\phi(\boldsymbol{y})\|^{2}= divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ( italic_f ( bold_italic_y ) - italic_f ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - ( italic_f ( bold_italic_y ) - italic_f ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ) ‚ü® bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_y end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , bold_italic_y - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ü© + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 ‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_y end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ‚à• ‚àá italic_œï ( bold_italic_y ) ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=12‚Å¢(f‚Å¢(ùíö)‚àíf‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ))2‚àí(f‚Å¢(ùíö)‚àíf‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ))‚Å¢‚ü®ùíàùíö,ùíö‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚ü©+(f‚Å¢(ùíö)‚àíf‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ))22absent12superscriptùëìùíöùëìsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ2ùëìùíöùëìsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜsubscriptùíàùíöùíösuperscriptùíô‚ãÜsuperscriptùëìùíöùëìsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ22\displaystyle=\frac{1}{2}(f(\boldsymbol{y})-f(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}))^{2}-(f(% \boldsymbol{y})-f(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}))\langle\boldsymbol{g}_{\boldsymbol{y% }},\boldsymbol{y}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\rangle+\frac{(f(\boldsymbol{y})-f(% \boldsymbol{x}^{\star}))^{2}}{2}= divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ( italic_f ( bold_italic_y ) - italic_f ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - ( italic_f ( bold_italic_y ) - italic_f ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ) ‚ü® bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_y end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , bold_italic_y - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ü© + divide start_ARG ( italic_f ( bold_italic_y ) - italic_f ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG
=(f‚Å¢(ùíö)‚àíf‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ))‚Å¢(f‚Å¢(ùíö)‚àíf‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ)‚àí‚ü®ùíàùíö,ùíö‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚ü©)absentùëìùíöùëìsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜùëìùíöùëìsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜsubscriptùíàùíöùíösuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ\displaystyle=(f(\boldsymbol{y})-f(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}))\left(f(\boldsymbol% {y})-f(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})-\langle\boldsymbol{g}_{\boldsymbol{y}},% \boldsymbol{y}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\rangle\right)= ( italic_f ( bold_italic_y ) - italic_f ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ) ( italic_f ( bold_italic_y ) - italic_f ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) - ‚ü® bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_y end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , bold_italic_y - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ü© )
‚â§0,absent0\displaystyle\leq 0,‚â§ 0 ,

where the inequality is due to the convexity of fùëìfitalic_f and the fact that f‚Å¢(ùíö)‚àíf‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ)‚â•0ùëìùíöùëìsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ0f(\boldsymbol{y})-f(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})\geq 0italic_f ( bold_italic_y ) - italic_f ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ‚â• 0.

For the second property, we have

f‚Å¢(ùíô)‚àíf‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ)‚â•Œ±‚Å¢‚Äñùíô‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ‚áíœï‚Å¢(ùíô)‚àíœï‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ)‚â•Œ±22‚Å¢‚Äñùíô‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2.ùëìùíôùëìsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜùõºnormùíôsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ‚áíitalic-œïùíôitalic-œïsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜsuperscriptùõº22superscriptnormùíôsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ2f(\boldsymbol{x})-f(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})\geq\alpha\|\boldsymbol{x}-% \boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|\Rightarrow\phi(\boldsymbol{x})-\phi(\boldsymbol{x}^{% \star})\geq\frac{\alpha^{2}}{2}\|\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}~{}.italic_f ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_f ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ‚â• italic_Œ± ‚à• bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• ‚áí italic_œï ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_œï ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ‚â• divide start_ARG italic_Œ± start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT .

For the third property we have

œï‚Å¢(ùíô)=12‚Å¢(f‚Å¢(ùíô)‚àíf‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ))2‚â•‚Äñùíà‚Äñ22‚Å¢L‚Å¢(f‚Å¢(ùíô)‚àíf‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ))‚â•12‚Å¢Œº‚Å¢‚Äñùíà‚Äñ22‚Å¢L‚Å¢‚Äñùíô‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2.italic-œïùíô12superscriptùëìùíôùëìsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ2superscriptnormùíà22ùêøùëìùíôùëìsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ12ùúásuperscriptnormùíà22ùêøsuperscriptnormùíôsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ2\displaystyle\phi(\boldsymbol{x})=\frac{1}{2}(f(\boldsymbol{x})-f(\boldsymbol{% x}^{\star}))^{2}\geq\frac{\|\boldsymbol{g}\|^{2}}{2L}(f(\boldsymbol{x})-f(% \boldsymbol{x}^{\star}))\geq\frac{1}{2}\frac{\mu\|\boldsymbol{g}\|^{2}}{2L}\|% \boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}.italic_œï ( bold_italic_x ) = divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ( italic_f ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_f ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â• divide start_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_g ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_L end_ARG ( italic_f ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_f ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ) ‚â• divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG divide start_ARG italic_Œº ‚à• bold_italic_g ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_L end_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT .

‚àé

Appendix B Relationship between Star Upper Curvature and Upper Quadratic Growth

For a function fùëìfitalic_f, denote by ùí≥‚ãÜ:={ùíô:f‚Å¢(ùíô)=minùíô‚Å°f‚Å¢(ùíô)}assignsuperscriptùí≥‚ãÜconditional-setùíôùëìùíôsubscriptùíôùëìùíô\mathcal{X}^{\star}:=\{\boldsymbol{x}:f(\boldsymbol{x})=\min_{\boldsymbol{x}}% \ f(\boldsymbol{x})\}caligraphic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT := { bold_italic_x : italic_f ( bold_italic_x ) = roman_min start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_f ( bold_italic_x ) }. In Guille-Escuret et¬†al. [2021], they define the following function class.

Definition 5.

A function fùëìfitalic_f is LùêøLitalic_L-quadratically upper bounded (denoted LùêøLitalic_L-QG+) if for all ùê±‚àà‚Ñùdùê±superscript‚Ñùùëë\boldsymbol{x}\in\mathbb{R}^{d}bold_italic_x ‚àà blackboard_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_d end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT:

f‚Å¢(ùíô)‚àíf‚ãÜ‚â§L2‚Å¢minùíô‚ãÜ‚ààùí≥‚ãÜ‚Å°‚Äñùíô‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ22.ùëìùíôsuperscriptùëì‚ãÜùêø2subscriptsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜsuperscriptùí≥‚ãÜsubscriptsuperscriptnormùíôsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ22f(\boldsymbol{x})-f^{\star}\leq\frac{L}{2}\min_{\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\in% \mathcal{X}^{\star}}\|\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}_{2}~{}.italic_f ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â§ divide start_ARG italic_L end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG roman_min start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚àà caligraphic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

We now show that convex LùêøLitalic_L-QG+ are globally LùêøLitalic_L-star upper curved, while the other direction is true for the local version of the two definitions.

Theorem 5.

Let fùëìfitalic_f be a convex LùêøLitalic_L-QG+ functions, then fùëìfitalic_f is globally LùêøLitalic_L-star upper curved. On the other hand, let fùëìfitalic_f be Lùê±subscriptùêøùê±L_{\boldsymbol{x}}italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT-LSUC, then for all ùê±ùê±\boldsymbol{x}bold_italic_x we have

f‚Å¢(ùíô)‚àíf‚ãÜ‚â§Lùíô2‚Å¢minùíô‚ãÜ‚ààùí≥‚ãÜ‚Å°‚Äñùíô‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ22.ùëìùíôsuperscriptùëì‚ãÜsubscriptùêøùíô2subscriptsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜsuperscriptùí≥‚ãÜsubscriptsuperscriptnormùíôsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ22f(\boldsymbol{x})-f^{\star}\leq\frac{L_{\boldsymbol{x}}}{2}\min_{\boldsymbol{x% }^{\star}\in\mathcal{X}^{\star}}\|\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}_% {2}~{}.italic_f ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â§ divide start_ARG italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG roman_min start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚àà caligraphic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .
Proof.

Assume that fùëìfitalic_f is LùêøLitalic_L-QG+. Then, we have

f‚Å¢(ùíö)+‚ü®ùíà,ùíô‚àíùíö‚ü©‚â§f‚Å¢(ùíô)‚â§f‚ãÜ+L2‚Å¢minùíô‚Ä≤‚ààùí≥‚ãÜ‚Å°‚Äñùíô‚àíùíô‚Ä≤‚Äñ22,ùëìùíöùíàùíôùíöùëìùíôsuperscriptùëì‚ãÜùêø2subscriptsuperscriptùíô‚Ä≤superscriptùí≥‚ãÜsubscriptsuperscriptnormùíôsuperscriptùíô‚Ä≤22f(\boldsymbol{y})+\langle\boldsymbol{g},\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{y}\rangle% \leq f(\boldsymbol{x})\leq f^{\star}+\frac{L}{2}\min_{\boldsymbol{x}^{\prime}% \in\mathcal{X}^{\star}}\|\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\prime}\|^{2}_{2},italic_f ( bold_italic_y ) + ‚ü® bold_italic_g , bold_italic_x - bold_italic_y ‚ü© ‚â§ italic_f ( bold_italic_x ) ‚â§ italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + divide start_ARG italic_L end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG roman_min start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚àà caligraphic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ,

where the first inequality is due to convexity and ùíà‚àà‚àÇf‚Å¢(ùíö)ùíàùëìùíö\boldsymbol{g}\in\partial f(\boldsymbol{y})bold_italic_g ‚àà ‚àÇ italic_f ( bold_italic_y ). Now, set ùíô=ùíô‚ãÜ+1L‚Å¢ùíàùíôsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ1ùêøùíà\boldsymbol{x}=\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}+\frac{1}{L}\boldsymbol{g}bold_italic_x = bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_L end_ARG bold_italic_g for any ùíô‚ãÜ‚ààùí≥‚ãÜsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜsuperscriptùí≥‚ãÜ\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\in\mathcal{X}^{\star}bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚àà caligraphic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT, to have

f‚Å¢(ùíö)‚àíf‚ãÜùëìùíösuperscriptùëì‚ãÜ\displaystyle f(\boldsymbol{y})-f^{\star}italic_f ( bold_italic_y ) - italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â§‚àí‚ü®ùíà,ùíô‚ãÜ+1L‚Å¢ùíà‚àíùíö‚ü©+L2‚Å¢minùíô‚Ä≤‚ààùí≥‚ãÜ‚Å°‚Äñùíô‚ãÜ+1L‚Å¢ùíà‚àíùíô‚Ä≤‚Äñ22‚â§‚àí‚ü®ùíà,ùíô‚ãÜ+1L‚Å¢ùíà‚àíùíö‚ü©+‚Äñùíà‚Äñ222‚Å¢Labsentùíàsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ1ùêøùíàùíöùêø2subscriptsuperscriptùíô‚Ä≤superscriptùí≥‚ãÜsubscriptsuperscriptnormsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ1ùêøùíàsuperscriptùíô‚Ä≤22ùíàsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ1ùêøùíàùíösubscriptsuperscriptnormùíà222ùêø\displaystyle\leq-\langle\boldsymbol{g},\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}+\frac{1}{L}% \boldsymbol{g}-\boldsymbol{y}\rangle+\frac{L}{2}\min_{\boldsymbol{x}^{\prime}% \in\mathcal{X}^{\star}}\left\|\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}+\frac{1}{L}\boldsymbol{g}% -\boldsymbol{x}^{\prime}\right\|^{2}_{2}\leq-\langle\boldsymbol{g},\boldsymbol% {x}^{\star}+\frac{1}{L}\boldsymbol{g}-\boldsymbol{y}\rangle+\frac{\|% \boldsymbol{g}\|^{2}_{2}}{2L}‚â§ - ‚ü® bold_italic_g , bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_L end_ARG bold_italic_g - bold_italic_y ‚ü© + divide start_ARG italic_L end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG roman_min start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚àà caligraphic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_L end_ARG bold_italic_g - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ - ‚ü® bold_italic_g , bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_L end_ARG bold_italic_g - bold_italic_y ‚ü© + divide start_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_g ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_L end_ARG
=‚ü®ùíà,ùíö‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚ü©‚àí12‚Å¢L‚Å¢‚Äñùíà‚Äñ22.absentùíàùíösuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ12ùêøsubscriptsuperscriptnormùíà22\displaystyle=\langle\boldsymbol{g},\boldsymbol{y}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}% \rangle-\frac{1}{2L}\|\boldsymbol{g}\|^{2}_{2}~{}.= ‚ü® bold_italic_g , bold_italic_y - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ü© - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_L end_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_g ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

Now, assume that fùëìfitalic_f is ŒªùíôsubscriptùúÜùíô\lambda_{\boldsymbol{x}}italic_Œª start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT-LSUC and set ùíà‚àà‚àÇf‚Å¢(ùíô)ùíàùëìùíô\boldsymbol{g}\in\partial f(\boldsymbol{x})bold_italic_g ‚àà ‚àÇ italic_f ( bold_italic_x ). For any ùíô‚ãÜ‚ààargminùíôf‚Å¢(ùíô)superscriptùíô‚ãÜsubscriptargminùíôùëìùíô\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\in\mathop{\mathrm{argmin}}_{\boldsymbol{x}}\ f(% \boldsymbol{x})bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚àà roman_argmin start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_f ( bold_italic_x ), using Cauchy-Schwarz‚Äôs inequality, we have

f‚Å¢(ùíô)‚àíf‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ)‚â§‚ü®ùíà,ùíô‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚ü©‚àí12‚Å¢Œªùíô‚Å¢‚Äñùíà‚Äñ22‚â§‚Äñùíà‚Äñ2‚Å¢‚Äñùíô‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2‚àí12‚Å¢Œªùíô‚Å¢‚Äñùíà‚Äñ22‚â§Œªùíô2‚Å¢‚Äñùíô‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ22.ùëìùíôùëìsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜùíàùíôsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ12subscriptùúÜùíôsubscriptsuperscriptnormùíà22subscriptnormùíà2subscriptnormùíôsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ212subscriptùúÜùíôsubscriptsuperscriptnormùíà22subscriptùúÜùíô2subscriptsuperscriptnormùíôsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ22f(\boldsymbol{x})-f(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})\leq\langle\boldsymbol{g},% \boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\rangle-\frac{1}{2\lambda_{\boldsymbol{x}% }}\|\boldsymbol{g}\|^{2}_{2}\leq\|\boldsymbol{g}\|_{2}\|\boldsymbol{x}-% \boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|_{2}-\frac{1}{2\lambda_{\boldsymbol{x}}}\|\boldsymbol{% g}\|^{2}_{2}\leq\frac{\lambda_{\boldsymbol{x}}}{2}\|\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol% {x}^{\star}\|^{2}_{2}~{}.italic_f ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_f ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ‚â§ ‚ü® bold_italic_g , bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ü© - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_Œª start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_g ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ ‚à• bold_italic_g ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_Œª start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_g ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ divide start_ARG italic_Œª start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

Given that this holds for all ùíô‚ãÜ‚ààùí≥‚ãÜsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜsuperscriptùí≥‚ãÜ\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\in\mathcal{X}^{\star}bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚àà caligraphic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT, it implies

f‚Å¢(ùíô)‚àíf‚ãÜ‚â§Œªùíô2‚Å¢minùíô‚Ä≤‚ààùí≥‚ãÜ‚Å°‚Äñùíô‚àíùíô‚Ä≤‚Äñ22.‚àéùëìùíôsuperscriptùëì‚ãÜsubscriptùúÜùíô2subscriptsuperscriptùíô‚Ä≤superscriptùí≥‚ãÜsubscriptsuperscriptnormùíôsuperscriptùíô‚Ä≤22f(\boldsymbol{x})-f^{\star}\leq\frac{\lambda_{\boldsymbol{x}}}{2}\min_{% \boldsymbol{x}^{\prime}\in\mathcal{X}^{\star}}\|\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}^% {\prime}\|^{2}_{2}~{}.\qeditalic_f ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â§ divide start_ARG italic_Œª start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG roman_min start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚àà caligraphic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT . italic_‚àé

Appendix C Proofs for the Stochastic Surrogate œàùúì\psiitalic_œà

Theorem 3.

Let h:‚Ñùd√óùíÆ‚Üí‚Ñù‚â•0:‚Ñé‚Üísuperscript‚ÑùùëëùíÆsubscript‚Ñùabsent0h:\mathbb{R}^{d}\times\mathcal{S}\to\mathbb{R}_{\geq 0}italic_h : blackboard_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_d end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT √ó caligraphic_S ‚Üí blackboard_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â• 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT be convex. Denote by H‚Å¢(ùê±)=ùîºùõè‚àºD‚Å¢[h‚Å¢(ùê±,ùõè)]ùêªùê±subscriptùîºsimilar-toùõèùê∑delimited-[]‚Ñéùê±ùõèH(\boldsymbol{x})=\mathbb{E}_{\boldsymbol{\xi}\sim D}[h(\boldsymbol{x},% \boldsymbol{\xi})]italic_H ( bold_italic_x ) = blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_Œæ ‚àº italic_D end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ italic_h ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Œæ ) ]. Then, setting Œ∑t=min‚Å°(1‚Äñùê†t‚Äñ2,Œ≥h‚Å¢(ùê±t,ùõèt))subscriptùúÇùë°1superscriptnormsubscriptùê†ùë°2ùõæ‚Ñésubscriptùê±ùë°subscriptùõèùë°\eta_{t}=\min\left(\frac{1}{\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|^{2}},\frac{\gamma}{h(% \boldsymbol{x}_{t},\boldsymbol{\xi}_{t})}\right)italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = roman_min ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG , divide start_ARG italic_Œ≥ end_ARG start_ARG italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , bold_italic_Œæ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG ) in Algorithm¬†1, we have

    and

  • ‚Ä¢

    If h‚Å¢(‚ãÖ,ùùÉt)‚Ñé‚ãÖsubscriptùùÉùë°h(\cdot,\boldsymbol{\xi}_{t})italic_h ( ‚ãÖ , bold_italic_Œæ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) is Gùê∫Gitalic_G-Lipschitz, then we have

    1T‚Å¢‚àët=1Tùîº‚Å¢[H‚Å¢(ùíôt)]‚â§‚Äñùíô1‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2Œ≥‚Å¢T+2‚Å¢H‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ)+G‚Å¢‚Äñùíô1‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚ÄñT+G‚Å¢2‚Å¢Œ≥‚Å¢H‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ).1ùëásuperscriptsubscriptùë°1ùëáùîºdelimited-[]ùêªsubscriptùíôùë°superscriptnormsubscriptùíô1superscriptùíô‚ãÜ2ùõæùëá2ùêªsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜùê∫normsubscriptùíô1superscriptùíô‚ãÜùëáùê∫2ùõæùêªsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ\frac{1}{T}\sum_{t=1}^{T}\mathbb{E}[H(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})]\leq\frac{\|% \boldsymbol{x}_{1}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}}{\gamma T}+2H(\boldsymbol{x}^{% \star})+\frac{G\|\boldsymbol{x}_{1}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|}{\sqrt{T}}+G\sqrt% {2\gamma H(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})}~{}.divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_T end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT blackboard_E [ italic_H ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] ‚â§ divide start_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œ≥ italic_T end_ARG + 2 italic_H ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) + divide start_ARG italic_G ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_T end_ARG end_ARG + italic_G square-root start_ARG 2 italic_Œ≥ italic_H ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG .
  • ‚Ä¢

    If h‚Å¢(‚ãÖ,ùùÉ)‚Ñé‚ãÖùùÉh(\cdot,\boldsymbol{\xi})italic_h ( ‚ãÖ , bold_italic_Œæ ) is LùêøLitalic_L-self-bounded and H‚Å¢(ùíô)ùêªùíôH(\boldsymbol{x})italic_H ( bold_italic_x ) has Œºùúá\muitalic_Œº-quadratic growth, then

    ùîº‚Å¢[‚ÄñùíôT+1‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2]‚â§ùîº‚Å¢[‚Äñùíô1‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2]‚Å¢aT+1+b‚Å¢1‚àíaT+11‚àía‚Å¢H‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ),ùîºdelimited-[]superscriptnormsubscriptùíôùëá1superscriptùíô‚ãÜ2ùîºdelimited-[]superscriptnormsubscriptùíô1superscriptùíô‚ãÜ2superscriptùëéùëá1ùëè1superscriptùëéùëá11ùëéùêªsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ\mathbb{E}\left[\|\boldsymbol{x}_{T+1}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}\right]\leq% \mathbb{E}\left[\|\boldsymbol{x}_{1}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}\right]a^{T+1% }+b\frac{1-a^{T+1}}{1-a}H(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}),blackboard_E [ ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ] ‚â§ blackboard_E [ ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ] italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T + 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_b divide start_ARG 1 - italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T + 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 1 - italic_a end_ARG italic_H ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ,

    where a=Œº2‚Å¢min‚Å°(12‚Å¢L,Œ≥)ùëéùúá212ùêøùõæa=\frac{\mu}{2}\min\left(\frac{1}{2L},\gamma\right)italic_a = divide start_ARG italic_Œº end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG roman_min ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_L end_ARG , italic_Œ≥ ) and b=2‚Å¢Œ≥‚àímin‚Å°(12‚Å¢L,Œ≥)ùëè2ùõæ12ùêøùõæb=2\gamma-\min\left(\frac{1}{2L},\gamma\right)italic_b = 2 italic_Œ≥ - roman_min ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_L end_ARG , italic_Œ≥ ).

Proof.

For simplicity, denote by ht‚Å¢(ùíô)=h‚Å¢(ùíô,Œæt)subscript‚Ñéùë°ùíô‚Ñéùíôsubscriptùúâùë°h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x})=h(\boldsymbol{x},\xi_{t})italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x ) = italic_h ( bold_italic_x , italic_Œæ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ).

From the Lemma¬†3, we have

‚àët=1TŒ∑t‚Å¢12‚Å¢ht2‚Å¢(ùíôt)‚â§12‚Å¢‚Äñùíô1‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2+‚àët=1TŒ∑t2‚Å¢(Œ∑t‚àí1‚Äñùíàt‚Äñ2)‚Å¢‚Äñùíàt‚Äñ2‚Å¢ht2‚Å¢(ùíôt)+‚àët=1TŒ∑t‚Å¢ht‚Å¢(ùíôt)‚Å¢ht‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ).superscriptsubscriptùë°1ùëásubscriptùúÇùë°12subscriptsuperscript‚Ñé2ùë°subscriptùíôùë°12superscriptnormsubscriptùíô1superscriptùíô‚ãÜ2superscriptsubscriptùë°1ùëásubscriptùúÇùë°2subscriptùúÇùë°1superscriptnormsubscriptùíàùë°2superscriptnormsubscriptùíàùë°2subscriptsuperscript‚Ñé2ùë°subscriptùíôùë°superscriptsubscriptùë°1ùëásubscriptùúÇùë°subscript‚Ñéùë°subscriptùíôùë°subscript‚Ñéùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜ\sum_{t=1}^{T}\eta_{t}\frac{1}{2}h^{2}_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})\leq\frac{1}{2}% \|\boldsymbol{x}_{1}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}+\sum_{t=1}^{T}\frac{\eta_{t}% }{2}\left(\eta_{t}-\frac{1}{\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|^{2}}\right)\|\boldsymbol{g}% _{t}\|^{2}h^{2}_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})+\sum_{t=1}^{T}\eta_{t}h_{t}(% \boldsymbol{x}_{t})h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})~{}.‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚â§ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ( italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ) ‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) .

For the last term in the r.h.s., we have

Œ∑t‚Å¢ht‚Å¢(ùíôt)‚Å¢ht‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ)=min‚Å°(1‚Äñùíàt‚Äñ2,Œ≥ht‚Å¢(ùíôt))‚Å¢ht‚Å¢(ùíôt)‚Å¢ht‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ)‚â§Œ≥‚Å¢ht‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ).subscriptùúÇùë°subscript‚Ñéùë°subscriptùíôùë°subscript‚Ñéùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜ1superscriptnormsubscriptùíàùë°2ùõæsubscript‚Ñéùë°subscriptùíôùë°subscript‚Ñéùë°subscriptùíôùë°subscript‚Ñéùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜùõæsubscript‚Ñéùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜ\eta_{t}h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})=\min\left(\frac% {1}{\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|^{2}},\frac{\gamma}{h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})}\right% )h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})\leq\gamma h_{t}(% \boldsymbol{x}^{\star})~{}.italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) = roman_min ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG , divide start_ARG italic_Œ≥ end_ARG start_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG ) italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ‚â§ italic_Œ≥ italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) .

Observe that if htsubscript‚Ñéùë°h_{t}italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT is LùêøLitalic_L-self bounded then ‚Äñgt‚Äñ2‚â§2‚Å¢L‚Å¢(ht‚Å¢(ùíô)‚àíinfùíôht‚Å¢(ùíô))‚â§2‚Å¢L‚Å¢ht‚Å¢(ùíô)superscriptnormsubscriptùëîùë°22ùêøsubscript‚Ñéùë°ùíôsubscriptinfimumùíôsubscript‚Ñéùë°ùíô2ùêøsubscript‚Ñéùë°ùíô\|g_{t}\|^{2}\leq 2L(h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x})-\inf_{\boldsymbol{x}}h_{t}(% \boldsymbol{x}))\leq 2Lh_{t}(\boldsymbol{x})‚à• italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â§ 2 italic_L ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x ) - roman_inf start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x ) ) ‚â§ 2 italic_L italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x ). Therefore, we have

min‚Å°(12‚Å¢L,Œ≥)‚Å¢ht‚Å¢(ùíôt)‚â§min‚Å°(ht‚Å¢(ùíôt)‚Äñùíàt‚Äñ2,Œ≥)‚Å¢ht‚Å¢(ùíôt)=Œ∑t‚Å¢ht2‚Å¢(ùíôt).12ùêøùõæsubscript‚Ñéùë°subscriptùíôùë°subscript‚Ñéùë°subscriptùíôùë°superscriptnormsubscriptùíàùë°2ùõæsubscript‚Ñéùë°subscriptùíôùë°subscriptùúÇùë°subscriptsuperscript‚Ñé2ùë°subscriptùíôùë°\min\left(\frac{1}{2L},\gamma\right)h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})\leq\min\left(% \frac{h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})}{\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|^{2}},\gamma\right)h_{t% }(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})=\eta_{t}h^{2}_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})~{}.roman_min ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_L end_ARG , italic_Œ≥ ) italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚â§ roman_min ( divide start_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG , italic_Œ≥ ) italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) = italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) .

Now, since Œ∑t‚â§1/‚Äñùíàt‚Äñ2subscriptùúÇùë°1superscriptnormsubscriptùíàùë°2\eta_{t}\leq\nicefrac{{1}}{{\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|^{2}}}italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â§ / start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG the second term on the r.h.s can be discarded because it‚Äôs negative. Taking expectations, we have the first stated bound.

For the second result, bring on the l.h.s. the terms Œ∑t2‚Å¢ht2‚Å¢(ùíôt)subscriptùúÇùë°2subscriptsuperscript‚Ñé2ùë°subscriptùíôùë°\frac{\eta_{t}}{2}h^{2}_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})divide start_ARG italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ). Taking expectations, we have the stated bound.

For the third result, first of all observe that for any a,b>0ùëéùëè0a,b>0italic_a , italic_b > 0 we have

min‚Å°(a,b)=1max‚Å°(1/a,1/b)‚â•11/a+1/b.ùëéùëè11ùëé1ùëè11ùëé1ùëè\min(a,b)=\frac{1}{\max(1/a,1/b)}\geq\frac{1}{1/a+1/b}~{}.roman_min ( italic_a , italic_b ) = divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG roman_max ( 1 / italic_a , 1 / italic_b ) end_ARG ‚â• divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 1 / italic_a + 1 / italic_b end_ARG .

Hence, we have

Œ∑t‚Å¢ht2‚Å¢(ùíôt)=min‚Å°(ht‚Å¢(ùíôt)‚Äñùíàt‚Äñ2,Œ≥)‚Å¢ht‚Å¢(ùíôt)‚â•Œ≥‚Å¢ht2‚Å¢(ùíôt)ht‚Å¢(ùíôt)+Œ≥‚Å¢‚Äñùíàt‚Äñ2‚â•Œ≥‚Å¢ht2‚Å¢(ùíôt)ht‚Å¢(ùíôt)+Œ≥‚Å¢G2.subscriptùúÇùë°subscriptsuperscript‚Ñé2ùë°subscriptùíôùë°subscript‚Ñéùë°subscriptùíôùë°superscriptnormsubscriptùíàùë°2ùõæsubscript‚Ñéùë°subscriptùíôùë°ùõæsuperscriptsubscript‚Ñéùë°2subscriptùíôùë°subscript‚Ñéùë°subscriptùíôùë°ùõæsuperscriptnormsubscriptùíàùë°2ùõæsuperscriptsubscript‚Ñéùë°2subscriptùíôùë°subscript‚Ñéùë°subscriptùíôùë°ùõæsuperscriptùê∫2\displaystyle\eta_{t}h^{2}_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})=\min\left(\frac{h_{t}(% start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ‚â• italic_Œ≥ divide start_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + italic_Œ≥ italic_G start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG .

Now, observe that the function B‚Å¢(x)=x2x+Œ≥‚Å¢G2ùêµùë•superscriptùë•2ùë•ùõæsuperscriptùê∫2B(x)=\frac{x^{2}}{x+\gamma G^{2}}italic_B ( italic_x ) = divide start_ARG italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_x + italic_Œ≥ italic_G start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG is convex x‚â•0ùë•0x\geq 0italic_x ‚â• 0, because B‚Ä≤‚Ä≤‚Å¢(x)=2‚Å¢Œ≥2‚Å¢G4(Œ≥‚Å¢G2+x)3superscriptùêµ‚Ä≤‚Ä≤ùë•2superscriptùõæ2superscriptùê∫4superscriptùõæsuperscriptùê∫2ùë•3B^{\prime\prime}(x)=\frac{2\gamma^{2}G^{4}}{(\gamma G^{2}+x)^{3}}italic_B start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_x ) = divide start_ARG 2 italic_Œ≥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_G start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 4 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG ( italic_Œ≥ italic_G start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_x ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 3 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG. So, summing over time and using Jensen‚Äôs inequality, we have

B‚Å¢(1T‚Å¢‚àët=1Tht‚Å¢(ùíôt))ùêµ1ùëásuperscriptsubscriptùë°1ùëásubscript‚Ñéùë°subscriptùíôùë°\displaystyle B\left(\frac{1}{T}\sum_{t=1}^{T}h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})\right)italic_B ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_T end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) ‚â§1T‚Å¢‚àët=1TB‚Å¢(ht‚Å¢(ùíôt))=1T‚Å¢‚àët=1Tht2‚Å¢(ùíôt)ht‚Å¢(ùíôt)+Œ≥‚Å¢G2‚â§‚Äñùíô1‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2Œ≥‚Å¢T+2T‚Å¢‚àët=1Tht‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ).absent1ùëásuperscriptsubscriptùë°1ùëáùêµsubscript‚Ñéùë°subscriptùíôùë°1ùëásuperscriptsubscriptùë°1ùëásubscriptsuperscript‚Ñé2ùë°subscriptùíôùë°subscript‚Ñéùë°subscriptùíôùë°ùõæsuperscriptùê∫2superscriptnormsubscriptùíô1superscriptùíô‚ãÜ2ùõæùëá2ùëásuperscriptsubscriptùë°1ùëásubscript‚Ñéùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜ\displaystyle\leq\frac{1}{T}\sum_{t=1}^{T}B(h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t}))=\frac{1% }{T}\sum_{t=1}^{T}\frac{h^{2}_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})}{h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t% })+\gamma G^{2}}\leq\frac{\|\boldsymbol{x}_{1}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}}{% \gamma T}+\frac{2}{T}\sum_{t=1}^{T}h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})~{}.‚â§ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_T end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) = divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_T end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + italic_Œ≥ italic_G start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ‚â§ divide start_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œ≥ italic_T end_ARG + divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_T end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) .

Note that B‚àí1‚Å¢(x)=x+x2+4‚Å¢x‚Å¢Œ≥‚Å¢G22‚â§x+G‚Å¢x‚Å¢Œ≥superscriptùêµ1ùë•ùë•superscriptùë•24ùë•ùõæsuperscriptùê∫22ùë•ùê∫ùë•ùõæB^{-1}(x)=\frac{x+\sqrt{x^{2}+4x\gamma G^{2}}}{2}\leq x+G\sqrt{x\gamma}italic_B start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_x ) = divide start_ARG italic_x + square-root start_ARG italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + 4 italic_x italic_Œ≥ italic_G start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ‚â§ italic_x + italic_G square-root start_ARG italic_x italic_Œ≥ end_ARG333Using the inequality z+y‚â§z+y‚àÄz,y‚â•0formulae-sequenceùëßùë¶ùëßùë¶for-allùëßùë¶0\sqrt{z+y}\leq\sqrt{z}+\sqrt{y}\quad\forall z,y\geq 0square-root start_ARG italic_z + italic_y end_ARG ‚â§ square-root start_ARG italic_z end_ARG + square-root start_ARG italic_y end_ARG ‚àÄ italic_z , italic_y ‚â• 0., that is an increasing concave function for x‚â•0ùë•0x\geq 0italic_x ‚â• 0. So, inverting BùêµBitalic_B and taking expectation, we have

1T‚Å¢‚àët=1Tùîº‚Å¢[H‚Å¢(ùíôt)]1ùëásuperscriptsubscriptùë°1ùëáùîºdelimited-[]ùêªsubscriptùíôùë°\displaystyle\frac{1}{T}\sum_{t=1}^{T}\mathbb{E}[H(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})]divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_T end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT blackboard_E [ italic_H ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] ‚â§ùîº‚Å¢[B‚àí1‚Å¢(‚Äñùíô1‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2Œ≥‚Å¢T+2T‚Å¢‚àët=1Tht‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ))]absentùîºdelimited-[]superscriptùêµ1superscriptnormsubscriptùíô1superscriptùíô‚ãÜ2ùõæùëá2ùëásuperscriptsubscriptùë°1ùëásubscript‚Ñéùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜ\displaystyle\leq\mathbb{E}\left[B^{-1}\left(\frac{\|\boldsymbol{x}_{1}-% \boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}}{\gamma T}+\frac{2}{T}\sum_{t=1}^{T}h_{t}(% \boldsymbol{x}^{\star})\right)\right]‚â§ blackboard_E [ italic_B start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( divide start_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œ≥ italic_T end_ARG + divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_T end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ) ]
‚â§‚Äñùíô1‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2Œ≥‚Å¢T+2‚Å¢H‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ)+G‚Å¢‚Äñùíô1‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚ÄñT+G‚Å¢2‚Å¢Œ≥‚Å¢H‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ).absentsuperscriptnormsubscriptùíô1superscriptùíô‚ãÜ2ùõæùëá2ùêªsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜùê∫normsubscriptùíô1superscriptùíô‚ãÜùëáùê∫2ùõæùêªsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ\displaystyle\leq\frac{\|\boldsymbol{x}_{1}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}}{% \gamma T}+2H(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})+\frac{G\|\boldsymbol{x}_{1}-\boldsymbol{x% }^{\star}\|}{\sqrt{T}}+G\sqrt{2\gamma H(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})}~{}.‚â§ divide start_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œ≥ italic_T end_ARG + 2 italic_H ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) + divide start_ARG italic_G ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_T end_ARG end_ARG + italic_G square-root start_ARG 2 italic_Œ≥ italic_H ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG .

For the smooth and quadratic growth case, we have

min‚Å°(12‚Å¢L,Œ≥)‚Å¢ht‚Å¢(ùíôt)12ùêøùõæsubscript‚Ñéùë°subscriptùíôùë°\displaystyle\min\left(\frac{1}{2L},\gamma\right)h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})roman_min ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_L end_ARG , italic_Œ≥ ) italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚â§Œ∑t‚Å¢ht2‚Å¢(ùíôt)absentsubscriptùúÇùë°subscriptsuperscript‚Ñé2ùë°subscriptùíôùë°\displaystyle\leq\eta_{t}h^{2}_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})‚â§ italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT )
‚â§‚Äñùíôt‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2‚àí‚Äñùíôt+1‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2+2‚Å¢Œ∑t‚Å¢ht‚Å¢(ùíôt)‚Å¢ht‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ)absentsuperscriptnormsubscriptùíôùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜ2superscriptnormsubscriptùíôùë°1superscriptùíô‚ãÜ22subscriptùúÇùë°subscript‚Ñéùë°subscriptùíôùë°subscript‚Ñéùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜ\displaystyle\leq\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}-\|% \boldsymbol{x}_{t+1}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}+2\eta_{t}h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x% }_{t})h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})‚â§ ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + 2 italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT )
‚â§‚Äñùíôt‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2‚àí‚Äñùíôt+1‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2+2‚Å¢Œ≥‚Å¢ht‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ).absentsuperscriptnormsubscriptùíôùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜ2superscriptnormsubscriptùíôùë°1superscriptùíô‚ãÜ22ùõæsubscript‚Ñéùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜ\displaystyle\leq\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}-\|% \boldsymbol{x}_{t+1}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}+2\gamma h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}% ^{\star})~{}.‚â§ ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + 2 italic_Œ≥ italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) .

Taking expectations and using the quadratic growth assumption on HùêªHitalic_H, we have

‚â§ùîº‚Å¢[‚Äñùíôt‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2]‚àíùîº‚Å¢[‚Äñùíôt+1‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2]+(2‚Å¢Œ≥‚àímin‚Å°(12‚Å¢L,Œ≥))‚Å¢H‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ).absentùîºdelimited-[]superscriptnormsubscriptùíôùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜ2ùîºdelimited-[]superscriptnormsubscriptùíôùë°1superscriptùíô‚ãÜ22ùõæ12ùêøùõæùêªsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ\displaystyle\leq\mathbb{E}\left[\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|% ^{2}\right]-\mathbb{E}\left[\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t+1}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2% }\right]+\left(2\gamma-\min\left(\frac{1}{2L},\gamma\right)\right)H(% \boldsymbol{x}^{\star})~{}.‚â§ blackboard_E [ ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ] - blackboard_E [ ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ] + ( 2 italic_Œ≥ - roman_min ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_L end_ARG , italic_Œ≥ ) ) italic_H ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) .

Hence, we obtain

ùîº‚Å¢[‚Äñùíôt+1‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2]‚â§(1‚àía)‚Å¢ùîº‚Å¢[‚Äñùíôt‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2]+b,ùîºdelimited-[]superscriptnormsubscriptùíôùë°1superscriptùíô‚ãÜ21ùëéùîºdelimited-[]superscriptnormsubscriptùíôùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜ2ùëè\mathbb{E}\left[\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t+1}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}\right]\leq% (1-a)\mathbb{E}\left[\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}\right]+b,blackboard_E [ ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ] ‚â§ ( 1 - italic_a ) blackboard_E [ ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ] + italic_b ,

where a=Œº2‚Å¢min‚Å°(12‚Å¢L,Œ≥)ùëéùúá212ùêøùõæa=\frac{\mu}{2}\min\left(\frac{1}{2L},\gamma\right)italic_a = divide start_ARG italic_Œº end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG roman_min ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_L end_ARG , italic_Œ≥ ) and b=(2‚Å¢Œ≥‚àímin‚Å°(12‚Å¢L,Œ≥))‚Å¢H‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ)ùëè2ùõæ12ùêøùõæùêªsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜb=\left(2\gamma-\min\left(\frac{1}{2L},\gamma\right)\right)H(\boldsymbol{x}^{% \star})italic_b = ( 2 italic_Œ≥ - roman_min ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_L end_ARG , italic_Œ≥ ) ) italic_H ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ). Note we have 0‚â§a‚â§Œº/4‚Å¢L‚â§10ùëéùúá4ùêø10\leq a\leq\nicefrac{{\mu}}{{4L}}\leq 10 ‚â§ italic_a ‚â§ / start_ARG italic_Œº end_ARG start_ARG 4 italic_L end_ARG ‚â§ 1. From this inequality, it is immediate to obtain

ùîº‚Å¢[‚ÄñùíôT+1‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2]‚â§ùîº‚Å¢[‚Äñùíô1‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2]‚Å¢aT+1+b‚Å¢1‚àíaT+11‚àía.‚àéùîºdelimited-[]superscriptnormsubscriptùíôùëá1superscriptùíô‚ãÜ2ùîºdelimited-[]superscriptnormsubscriptùíô1superscriptùíô‚ãÜ2superscriptùëéùëá1ùëè1superscriptùëéùëá11ùëé\mathbb{E}\left[\|\boldsymbol{x}_{T+1}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}\right]\leq% \mathbb{E}\left[\|\boldsymbol{x}_{1}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}\right]a^{T+1% }+b\frac{1-a^{T+1}}{1-a}~{}.\qedblackboard_E [ ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ] ‚â§ blackboard_E [ ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ] italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T + 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_b divide start_ARG 1 - italic_a start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T + 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 1 - italic_a end_ARG . italic_‚àé

Appendix D Additional Convergence Result for Generalized Polyak Stepsize

Corollary 1.

Let f:‚Ñùd√óùíÆ:ùëìsuperscript‚ÑùùëëùíÆf:\mathbb{R}^{d}\times\mathcal{S}italic_f : blackboard_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_d end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT √ó caligraphic_S be convex and LùêøLitalic_L-self-bounded. Define ùê±‚ãÜ=argminùê±(ùîºùõè‚àºD‚Å¢[f‚Å¢(ùê±,ùõè)]:=F‚Å¢(ùê±))superscriptùê±‚ãÜsubscriptargminùê±assignsubscriptùîºsimilar-toùõèùê∑delimited-[]ùëìùê±ùõèùêπùê±\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}=\mathop{\mathrm{argmin}}_{\boldsymbol{x}}\ (\mathbb{E}_% {\boldsymbol{\xi}\sim D}[f(\boldsymbol{x},\boldsymbol{\xi})]:=F(\boldsymbol{x}))bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = roman_argmin start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_Œæ ‚àº italic_D end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ italic_f ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Œæ ) ] := italic_F ( bold_italic_x ) ). Let h‚Å¢(ùê±,ùõè)=(f‚Å¢(ùê±,ùõè)‚àíf‚Å¢(ùê±‚ãÜ,ùõè))+‚Ñéùê±ùõèsubscriptùëìùê±ùõèùëìsuperscriptùê±‚ãÜùõèh(\boldsymbol{x},\boldsymbol{\xi})=(f(\boldsymbol{x},\boldsymbol{\xi})-f(% \boldsymbol{x}^{\star},\boldsymbol{\xi}))_{+}italic_h ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Œæ ) = ( italic_f ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Œæ ) - italic_f ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , bold_italic_Œæ ) ) start_POSTSUBSCRIPT + end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. Then, running Algorithm¬†1 with Œ≥=‚àûùõæ\gamma=\inftyitalic_Œ≥ = ‚àû, we have

ùîº‚Å¢[F‚Å¢(ùíô¬ØT)]‚àíF‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ)‚â§2‚Å¢L‚Å¢‚Äñùíô1‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2T+ùîº[2‚Å¢L‚Å¢(F‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ)‚àíùîº‚Å¢[infùíôf‚Å¢(ùíô,ùùÉ)])‚à•ùíô1‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚à•T,\mathbb{E}[F(\bar{\boldsymbol{x}}_{T})]-F(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})\leq\frac{2L% \|\boldsymbol{x}_{1}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}}{T}+\frac{\mathbb{E}[\sqrt{2% L(F(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})-\mathbb{E}[\inf_{\boldsymbol{x}}f(\boldsymbol{x},% \boldsymbol{\xi})])}\|\boldsymbol{x}_{1}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|}{\sqrt{T}},blackboard_E [ italic_F ( over¬Ø start_ARG bold_italic_x end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] - italic_F ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ‚â§ divide start_ARG 2 italic_L ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_T end_ARG + divide start_ARG blackboard_E [ square-root start_ARG 2 italic_L ( italic_F ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) - blackboard_E [ roman_inf start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_f ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Œæ ) ] ) end_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_T end_ARG end_ARG ,

where ùê±¬ØT=1T‚Å¢‚àët=1Tùê±tsubscript¬Øùê±ùëá1ùëásuperscriptsubscriptùë°1ùëásubscriptùê±ùë°\bar{\boldsymbol{x}}_{T}=\frac{1}{T}\sum_{t=1}^{T}\boldsymbol{x}_{t}over¬Ø start_ARG bold_italic_x end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_T end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT or ùê±¬ØT=argminùê±‚àà{ùê±1,‚Ä¶,ùê±T}F‚Å¢(ùê±)subscript¬Øùê±ùëásubscriptargminùê±subscriptùê±1‚Ä¶subscriptùê±ùëáùêπùê±\bar{\boldsymbol{x}}_{T}=\mathop{\mathrm{argmin}}_{\boldsymbol{x}\in\{% \boldsymbol{x}_{1},\dots,\boldsymbol{x}_{T}\}}\ F(\boldsymbol{x})over¬Ø start_ARG bold_italic_x end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = roman_argmin start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x ‚àà { bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , ‚Ä¶ , bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT } end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_F ( bold_italic_x ).

Proof.

Given the definition of h‚Ñéhitalic_h, we have that H‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ)=0ùêªsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ0H(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})=0italic_H ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) = 0. Moreover, h‚Å¢(ùíô,ùùÉ)‚â•f‚Å¢(ùíô,ùùÉ)‚àíf‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ,ùùÉ)‚ÑéùíôùùÉùëìùíôùùÉùëìsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜùùÉh(\boldsymbol{x},\boldsymbol{\xi})\geq f(\boldsymbol{x},\boldsymbol{\xi})-f(% \boldsymbol{x}^{\star},\boldsymbol{\xi})italic_h ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Œæ ) ‚â• italic_f ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Œæ ) - italic_f ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , bold_italic_Œæ ), hence ùîº‚Å¢[H‚Å¢(ùíôt)]‚â•ùîº‚Å¢[F‚Å¢(ùíôt)]‚àíF‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ)ùîºdelimited-[]ùêªsubscriptùíôùë°ùîºdelimited-[]ùêπsubscriptùíôùë°ùêπsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ\mathbb{E}[H(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})]\geq\mathbb{E}[F(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})]-F(% \boldsymbol{x}^{\star})blackboard_E [ italic_H ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] ‚â• blackboard_E [ italic_F ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] - italic_F ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) for any tùë°titalic_t.

We have that

‚àÇh‚Å¢(ùíô,ùùÉ)={‚àÇf‚Å¢(ùíô,ùùÉ),¬†if¬†‚Å¢f‚Å¢(ùíô,ùùÉ)>f‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ,ùùÉ){0},¬†if¬†‚Å¢f‚Å¢(ùíô,ùùÉ)<f‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ,ùùÉ){Œ±‚Å¢ùíà:Œ±‚àà[0,1],ùíà‚àà‚àÇf‚Å¢(ùíô,ùùÉ)},¬†if¬†‚Å¢f‚Å¢(ùíô,ùùÉ)=f‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ,ùùÉ).‚ÑéùíôùùÉcasesùëìùíôùùÉ¬†if¬†ùëìùíôùùÉùëìsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜùùÉ0¬†if¬†ùëìùíôùùÉùëìsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜùùÉconditional-setùõºùíàformulae-sequenceùõº01ùíàùëìùíôùùÉ¬†if¬†ùëìùíôùùÉùëìsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜùùÉ\partial h(\boldsymbol{x},\boldsymbol{\xi})=\begin{cases}\partial f(% \boldsymbol{x},\boldsymbol{\xi}),&\text{ if }f(\boldsymbol{x},\boldsymbol{\xi}% )>f(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star},\boldsymbol{\xi})\\ \{0\},&\text{ if }f(\boldsymbol{x},\boldsymbol{\xi})<f(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star},% \boldsymbol{\xi})\\ \{\alpha\boldsymbol{g}:\alpha\in[0,1],\boldsymbol{g}\in\partial f(\boldsymbol{% x},\boldsymbol{\xi})\},&\text{ if }f(\boldsymbol{x},\boldsymbol{\xi})=f(% \boldsymbol{x}^{\star},\boldsymbol{\xi})\end{cases}~{}.‚àÇ italic_h ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Œæ ) = { start_ROW start_CELL ‚àÇ italic_f ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Œæ ) , end_CELL start_CELL if italic_f ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Œæ ) > italic_f ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , bold_italic_Œæ ) end_CELL end_ROW start_ROW start_CELL { 0 } , end_CELL start_CELL if italic_f ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Œæ ) < italic_f ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , bold_italic_Œæ ) end_CELL end_ROW start_ROW start_CELL { italic_Œ± bold_italic_g : italic_Œ± ‚àà [ 0 , 1 ] , bold_italic_g ‚àà ‚àÇ italic_f ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Œæ ) } , end_CELL start_CELL if italic_f ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Œæ ) = italic_f ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , bold_italic_Œæ ) end_CELL end_ROW .

Hence, for all ùíàt‚àà‚àÇh‚Å¢(ùíôt,ùùÉt)subscriptùíàùë°‚Ñésubscriptùíôùë°subscriptùùÉùë°\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\in\partial h(\boldsymbol{x}_{t},\boldsymbol{\xi}_{t})bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚àà ‚àÇ italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , bold_italic_Œæ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) we have

‚Äñùíàt‚Äñ2superscriptnormsubscriptùíàùë°2\displaystyle\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|^{2}‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â§2‚Å¢L‚Å¢(f‚Å¢(ùíô,ùùÉt)‚àíinfùíôf‚Å¢(ùíô,ùùÉt))absent2ùêøùëìùíôsubscriptùùÉùë°subscriptinfimumùíôùëìùíôsubscriptùùÉùë°\displaystyle\leq 2L(f(\boldsymbol{x},\boldsymbol{\xi}_{t})-\inf_{\boldsymbol{% x}}\ f(\boldsymbol{x},\boldsymbol{\xi}_{t}))‚â§ 2 italic_L ( italic_f ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Œæ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - roman_inf start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_f ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Œæ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) )
=2‚Å¢L‚Å¢(f‚Å¢(ùíô,ùùÉt)‚àíf‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ,ùùÉt)+f‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ,ùùÉt)‚àíinfùíôf‚Å¢(ùíô,ùùÉt))absent2ùêøùëìùíôsubscriptùùÉùë°ùëìsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜsubscriptùùÉùë°ùëìsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜsubscriptùùÉùë°subscriptinfimumùíôùëìùíôsubscriptùùÉùë°\displaystyle=2L(f(\boldsymbol{x},\boldsymbol{\xi}_{t})-f(\boldsymbol{x}^{% \star},\boldsymbol{\xi}_{t})+f(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star},\boldsymbol{\xi}_{t})-% \inf_{\boldsymbol{x}}f(\boldsymbol{x},\boldsymbol{\xi}_{t}))= 2 italic_L ( italic_f ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Œæ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_f ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , bold_italic_Œæ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + italic_f ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , bold_italic_Œæ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - roman_inf start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_f ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Œæ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) )
‚â§2‚Å¢L‚Å¢(h‚Å¢(ùíô,ùùÉt)+f‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ,ùùÉt)‚àíinfùíôf‚Å¢(ùíô,ùùÉt)).absent2ùêø‚ÑéùíôsubscriptùùÉùë°ùëìsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜsubscriptùùÉùë°subscriptinfimumùíôùëìùíôsubscriptùùÉùë°\displaystyle\leq 2L(h(\boldsymbol{x},\boldsymbol{\xi}_{t})+f(\boldsymbol{x}^{% \star},\boldsymbol{\xi}_{t})-\inf_{\boldsymbol{x}}f(\boldsymbol{x},\boldsymbol% {\xi}_{t}))~{}.‚â§ 2 italic_L ( italic_h ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Œæ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + italic_f ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , bold_italic_Œæ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - roman_inf start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_f ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Œæ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) .

So, using this inequality in Lemma¬†3 gives

‚àët=1Tht2‚Å¢(ùíôt)4‚Å¢L‚Å¢(ht‚Å¢(ùíôt)+ft‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ)‚àíft‚ãÜ)‚â§‚àët=1Tht2‚Å¢(ùíôt)2‚Å¢‚Äñùíàt‚Äñ2=‚àët=1TŒ∑t‚Å¢12‚Å¢ht2‚Å¢(ùíôt)‚â§12‚Å¢‚Äñùíô1‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2.superscriptsubscriptùë°1ùëásubscriptsuperscript‚Ñé2ùë°subscriptùíôùë°4ùêøsubscript‚Ñéùë°subscriptùíôùë°subscriptùëìùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜsuperscriptsubscriptùëìùë°‚ãÜsuperscriptsubscriptùë°1ùëásubscriptsuperscript‚Ñé2ùë°subscriptùíôùë°2superscriptnormsubscriptùíàùë°2superscriptsubscriptùë°1ùëásubscriptùúÇùë°12subscriptsuperscript‚Ñé2ùë°subscriptùíôùë°12superscriptnormsubscriptùíô1superscriptùíô‚ãÜ2\sum_{t=1}^{T}\frac{h^{2}_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})}{4L(h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t}% )+f_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})-f_{t}^{\star})}\leq\sum_{t=1}^{T}\frac{h^{2}_{% t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})}{2\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|^{2}}=\sum_{t=1}^{T}\eta_{t}% \frac{1}{2}h^{2}_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})\leq\frac{1}{2}\|\boldsymbol{x}_{1}-% \boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}~{}.‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG 4 italic_L ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) - italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG ‚â§ ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 ‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG = ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚â§ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT . (8)

Now, from Cauchy‚ÄìSchwarz inequality, for any non-negative random variable YùëåYitalic_Y and random variable XùëãXitalic_X, we have ùîº‚Å¢[X2/Y]‚â•(ùîº‚Å¢[X])2/ùîº‚Å¢[Y]ùîºdelimited-[]superscriptùëã2ùëåsuperscriptùîºdelimited-[]ùëã2ùîºdelimited-[]ùëå\mathbb{E}[X^{2}/Y]\geq(\mathbb{E}[X])^{2}/\mathbb{E}[Y]blackboard_E [ italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT / italic_Y ] ‚â• ( blackboard_E [ italic_X ] ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT / blackboard_E [ italic_Y ]. Denote by ft‚ãÜ=infùíôf‚Å¢(ùíô,ùùÉt)superscriptsubscriptùëìùë°‚ãÜsubscriptinfimumùíôùëìùíôsubscriptùùÉùë°f_{t}^{\star}=\inf_{\boldsymbol{x}}\ f(\boldsymbol{x},\boldsymbol{\xi}_{t})italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = roman_inf start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_f ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Œæ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ). Given that ft‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ)‚àíft‚ãÜ‚â•0subscriptùëìùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜsubscriptsuperscriptùëì‚ãÜùë°0f_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})-f^{\star}_{t}\geq 0italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) - italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â• 0, if ft‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ)‚àíft‚ãÜ=0subscriptùëìùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜsubscriptsuperscriptùëì‚ãÜùë°0f_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})-f^{\star}_{t}=0italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) - italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = 0 with probability 1, i.e., F‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ)‚àíùîº‚Å¢[infùíôf‚Å¢(ùíô,ùùÉ)]=0ùêπsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜùîºdelimited-[]subscriptinfimumùíôùëìùíôùùÉ0F(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})-\mathbb{E}[\inf_{\boldsymbol{x}}f(\boldsymbol{x},% \boldsymbol{\xi})]=0italic_F ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) - blackboard_E [ roman_inf start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_f ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Œæ ) ] = 0, then the expectation of the l.h.s. of the previous inequality is ùîº‚Å¢[ht‚Å¢(ùíôt)]ùîºdelimited-[]subscript‚Ñéùë°subscriptùíôùë°\mathbb{E}[h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})]blackboard_E [ italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ]. Otherwise, if we assume F‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ)‚àíùîº‚Å¢[infùíôf‚Å¢(ùíô,ùùÉ)]>0ùêπsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜùîºdelimited-[]subscriptinfimumùíôùëìùíôùùÉ0F(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})-\mathbb{E}[\inf_{\boldsymbol{x}}f(\boldsymbol{x},% \boldsymbol{\xi})]>0italic_F ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) - blackboard_E [ roman_inf start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_f ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Œæ ) ] > 0, we have

ùîº‚Å¢[ht2‚Å¢(ùíôt)4‚Å¢L‚Å¢(ht‚Å¢(ùíôt)+ft‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ)‚àíft‚ãÜ)]‚â•(ùîº‚Å¢[ht‚Å¢(ùíôt)])24‚Å¢L‚Å¢(ùîº‚Å¢[ht‚Å¢(ùíôt)]+F‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ)‚àíùîº‚Å¢[infùíôf‚Å¢(ùíô,ùùÉ)]).ùîºdelimited-[]subscriptsuperscript‚Ñé2ùë°subscriptùíôùë°4ùêøsubscript‚Ñéùë°subscriptùíôùë°subscriptùëìùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜsuperscriptsubscriptùëìùë°‚ãÜsuperscriptùîºdelimited-[]subscript‚Ñéùë°subscriptùíôùë°24ùêøùîºdelimited-[]subscript‚Ñéùë°subscriptùíôùë°ùêπsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜùîºdelimited-[]subscriptinfimumùíôùëìùíôùùÉ\mathbb{E}\left[\frac{h^{2}_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})}{4L(h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{% t})+f_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})-f_{t}^{\star})}\right]\geq\frac{(\mathbb{E}[% h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})])^{2}}{4L(\mathbb{E}[h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})]+F(% \boldsymbol{x}^{\star})-\mathbb{E}[\inf_{\boldsymbol{x}}f(\boldsymbol{x},% \boldsymbol{\xi})])}~{}.blackboard_E [ divide start_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG 4 italic_L ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) - italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG ] ‚â• divide start_ARG ( blackboard_E [ italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 4 italic_L ( blackboard_E [ italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] + italic_F ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) - blackboard_E [ roman_inf start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_f ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Œæ ) ] ) end_ARG .

Hence, in all cases we have the last expression is a lower bound to the l.h.s. of (8). We now can proceed as in the proof of the Lipschitz case in Theorem¬†3, to have the stated bound. ‚àé

We now extend Theorem¬†3 to H√∂lder-self-bounded functions.

Definition 6.

We say that fùëìfitalic_f is (LŒΩ,ŒΩ)subscriptùêøùúàùúà(L_{\nu},\nu)( italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ŒΩ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_ŒΩ ) H√∂lder-self-bounded if there exits ŒΩ‚àà[0,1]ùúà01\nu\in[0,1]italic_ŒΩ ‚àà [ 0 , 1 ] and LŒΩsubscriptùêøùúàL_{\nu}italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ŒΩ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT such That

‚Äñùíà‚Äñ2‚â§(1+1ŒΩ)2‚Å¢ŒΩ1+ŒΩ‚Å¢LŒΩ21+ŒΩ‚Å¢(f‚Å¢(ùíô)‚àíf‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ))2‚Å¢ŒΩ1+ŒΩ,‚àÄùíà‚àà‚àÇf‚Å¢(ùíô).formulae-sequencesuperscriptnormùíà2superscript11ùúà2ùúà1ùúàsubscriptsuperscriptùêø21ùúàùúàsuperscriptùëìùíôùëìsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ2ùúà1ùúàfor-allùíàùëìùíô\|\boldsymbol{g}\|^{2}\leq\left(1+\frac{1}{\nu}\right)^{\frac{2\nu}{1+\nu}}L^{% \frac{2}{1+\nu}}_{\nu}(f(\boldsymbol{x})-f(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}))^{\frac{2% \nu}{1+\nu}},\ \forall\boldsymbol{g}\in\partial f(\boldsymbol{x})~{}.‚à• bold_italic_g ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â§ ( 1 + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_ŒΩ end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 italic_ŒΩ end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_ŒΩ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_ŒΩ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ŒΩ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_f ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_f ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 italic_ŒΩ end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_ŒΩ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , ‚àÄ bold_italic_g ‚àà ‚àÇ italic_f ( bold_italic_x ) .

This definition is weaker than both Lipschitz and smoothness and it is easy to see that LùêøLitalic_L-smooth functions satisfies this condition with ŒΩ=1ùúà1\nu=1italic_ŒΩ = 1 and L1=Lsubscriptùêø1ùêøL_{1}=Litalic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_L.

The following theorem generalizes both the Lipschitz and the smooth case, recovering both bounds up to constant factors.

Theorem 7.

Let h:‚Ñùd√óùíÆ‚Üí‚Ñù‚â•0:‚Ñé‚Üísuperscript‚ÑùùëëùíÆsubscript‚Ñùabsent0h:\mathbb{R}^{d}\times\mathcal{S}\to\mathbb{R}_{\geq 0}italic_h : blackboard_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_d end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT √ó caligraphic_S ‚Üí blackboard_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚â• 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT be convex. Denote by H‚Å¢(ùê±)=ùîºùõè‚àºD‚Å¢[h‚Å¢(ùê±,ùõè)]ùêªùê±subscriptùîºsimilar-toùõèùê∑delimited-[]‚Ñéùê±ùõèH(\boldsymbol{x})=\mathbb{E}_{\boldsymbol{\xi}\sim D}[h(\boldsymbol{x},% \boldsymbol{\xi})]italic_H ( bold_italic_x ) = blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_Œæ ‚àº italic_D end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ italic_h ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Œæ ) ]. Assume that h‚Å¢(‚ãÖ,ùõèt)‚Ñé‚ãÖsubscriptùõèùë°h(\cdot,\boldsymbol{\xi}_{t})italic_h ( ‚ãÖ , bold_italic_Œæ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) is (LŒΩ,ŒΩ)subscriptùêøùúàùúà(L_{\nu},\nu)( italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ŒΩ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_ŒΩ )-H√∂lder-self bounded. Then, setting Œ∑t=min‚Å°(1‚Äñùê†t‚Äñ2,Œ≥h‚Å¢(ùê±t,ùõèt))subscriptùúÇùë°1superscriptnormsubscriptùê†ùë°2ùõæ‚Ñésubscriptùê±ùë°subscriptùõèùë°\eta_{t}=\min\left(\frac{1}{\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|^{2}},\frac{\gamma}{h(% \boldsymbol{x}_{t},\boldsymbol{\xi}_{t})}\right)italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = roman_min ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG , divide start_ARG italic_Œ≥ end_ARG start_ARG italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , bold_italic_Œæ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG ) in Algorithm¬†1, we have

1T‚Å¢‚àët=1Tùîº‚Å¢[H‚Å¢(ùíôt)]‚â§Q‚Å¢(‚Äñùíô1‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2T‚Å¢Œ≥+2‚Å¢H‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ)),1ùëásuperscriptsubscriptùë°1ùëáùîºdelimited-[]ùêªsubscriptùíôùë°ùëÑsuperscriptnormsubscriptùíô1superscriptùíô‚ãÜ2ùëáùõæ2ùêªsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ\frac{1}{T}\sum_{t=1}^{T}\mathbb{E}[H(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})]\leq Q\left(\frac{\|% \boldsymbol{x}_{1}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}}{T\gamma}+2H(\boldsymbol{x}^{% \star})\right),divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_T end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT blackboard_E [ italic_H ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] ‚â§ italic_Q ( divide start_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_T italic_Œ≥ end_ARG + 2 italic_H ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ) ,

where Q‚Å¢(y)=2‚Å¢y+LŒΩ‚Å¢(2‚Å¢Œ≥‚Å¢y)1+ŒΩ2‚Å¢(1+1ŒΩ)ŒΩùëÑùë¶2ùë¶subscriptùêøùúàsuperscript2ùõæùë¶1ùúà2superscript11ùúàùúàQ(y)=2y+L_{\nu}(2\gamma y)^{\frac{1+\nu}{2}}\left(1+\frac{1}{\nu}\right)^{\nu}italic_Q ( italic_y ) = 2 italic_y + italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ŒΩ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( 2 italic_Œ≥ italic_y ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 + italic_ŒΩ end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_ŒΩ end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_ŒΩ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT.

Proof.

For simplicity, denote by ht‚Å¢(ùíô)=h‚Å¢(ùíô,Œæt)subscript‚Ñéùë°ùíô‚Ñéùíôsubscriptùúâùë°h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x})=h(\boldsymbol{x},\xi_{t})italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x ) = italic_h ( bold_italic_x , italic_Œæ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ).

From the Lemma¬†3, we have

‚àët=1TŒ∑t‚Å¢12‚Å¢ht2‚Å¢(ùíôt)‚â§12‚Å¢‚Äñùíô1‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2+‚àët=1TŒ∑t2‚Å¢(Œ∑t‚àí1‚Äñùíàt‚Äñ2)‚Å¢‚Äñùíàt‚Äñ2‚Å¢ht2‚Å¢(ùíôt)+‚àët=1TŒ∑t‚Å¢ht‚Å¢(ùíôt)‚Å¢ht‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ).superscriptsubscriptùë°1ùëásubscriptùúÇùë°12subscriptsuperscript‚Ñé2ùë°subscriptùíôùë°12superscriptnormsubscriptùíô1superscriptùíô‚ãÜ2superscriptsubscriptùë°1ùëásubscriptùúÇùë°2subscriptùúÇùë°1superscriptnormsubscriptùíàùë°2superscriptnormsubscriptùíàùë°2subscriptsuperscript‚Ñé2ùë°subscriptùíôùë°superscriptsubscriptùë°1ùëásubscriptùúÇùë°subscript‚Ñéùë°subscriptùíôùë°subscript‚Ñéùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜ\sum_{t=1}^{T}\eta_{t}\frac{1}{2}h^{2}_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})\leq\frac{1}{2}% \|\boldsymbol{x}_{1}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}+\sum_{t=1}^{T}\frac{\eta_{t}% }{2}\left(\eta_{t}-\frac{1}{\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|^{2}}\right)\|\boldsymbol{g}% _{t}\|^{2}h^{2}_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})+\sum_{t=1}^{T}\eta_{t}h_{t}(% \boldsymbol{x}_{t})h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})~{}.‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚â§ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ( italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ) ‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) .

For the last term in the r.h.s., we have

Œ∑t‚Å¢ht‚Å¢(ùíôt)‚Å¢ht‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ)=min‚Å°(1‚Äñùíàt‚Äñ2,Œ≥ht‚Å¢(ùíôt))‚Å¢ht‚Å¢(ùíôt)‚Å¢ht‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ)‚â§Œ≥‚Å¢ht‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ).subscriptùúÇùë°subscript‚Ñéùë°subscriptùíôùë°subscript‚Ñéùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜ1superscriptnormsubscriptùíàùë°2ùõæsubscript‚Ñéùë°subscriptùíôùë°subscript‚Ñéùë°subscriptùíôùë°subscript‚Ñéùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜùõæsubscript‚Ñéùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜ\eta_{t}h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})=\min\left(\frac% {1}{\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|^{2}},\frac{\gamma}{h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})}\right% )h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})\leq\gamma h_{t}(% \boldsymbol{x}^{\star})~{}.italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) = roman_min ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG , divide start_ARG italic_Œ≥ end_ARG start_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG ) italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ‚â§ italic_Œ≥ italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) .

Observe that if htsubscript‚Ñéùë°h_{t}italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT is (LŒΩ,ŒΩ)subscriptùêøùúàùúà(L_{\nu},\nu)( italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ŒΩ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_ŒΩ )-H√∂lder-self-bounded then

‚Äñgt‚Äñ2‚â§(1+1ŒΩ)2‚Å¢ŒΩ1+ŒΩ‚Å¢LŒΩ21+ŒΩ‚Å¢(ht‚Å¢(ùíô)‚àíinfùíôht‚Å¢(ùíô))2‚Å¢ŒΩ1+ŒΩ‚â§KŒΩ‚Å¢ht‚Å¢(ùíô)2‚Å¢ŒΩ1+ŒΩ,superscriptnormsubscriptùëîùë°2superscript11ùúà2ùúà1ùúàsubscriptsuperscriptùêø21ùúàùúàsuperscriptsubscript‚Ñéùë°ùíôsubscriptinfimumùíôsubscript‚Ñéùë°ùíô2ùúà1ùúàsubscriptùêæùúàsubscript‚Ñéùë°superscriptùíô2ùúà1ùúà\displaystyle\|g_{t}\|^{2}\leq\left(1+\frac{1}{\nu}\right)^{\frac{2\nu}{1+\nu}% }L^{\frac{2}{1+\nu}}_{\nu}(h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x})-\inf_{\boldsymbol{x}}h_{t}(% \boldsymbol{x}))^{\frac{2\nu}{1+\nu}}\leq K_{\nu}h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x})^{\frac{% 2\nu}{1+\nu}},‚à• italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â§ ( 1 + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_ŒΩ end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 italic_ŒΩ end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_ŒΩ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_ŒΩ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ŒΩ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x ) - roman_inf start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x ) ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 italic_ŒΩ end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_ŒΩ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â§ italic_K start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ŒΩ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 italic_ŒΩ end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_ŒΩ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ,

where KŒΩ=(1+1ŒΩ)2‚Å¢ŒΩ1+ŒΩ‚Å¢LŒΩ21+ŒΩsubscriptùêæùúàsuperscript11ùúà2ùúà1ùúàsubscriptsuperscriptùêø21ùúàùúàK_{\nu}=\left(1+\frac{1}{\nu}\right)^{\frac{2\nu}{1+\nu}}L^{\frac{2}{1+\nu}}_{\nu}italic_K start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ŒΩ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = ( 1 + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_ŒΩ end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 italic_ŒΩ end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_ŒΩ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_ŒΩ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ŒΩ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. Therefore, we have
