min‚Å°(ht1‚àíŒΩ1+ŒΩ‚Å¢(ùíôt)KŒΩ,Œ≥)‚Å¢ht‚Å¢(ùíôt)‚â§min‚Å°(ht‚Å¢(ùíôt)‚Äñùíàt‚Äñ2,Œ≥)‚Å¢ht‚Å¢(ùíôt)=Œ∑t‚Å¢ht2‚Å¢(ùíôt).subscriptsuperscript‚Ñé1ùúà1ùúàùë°subscriptùíôùë°subscriptùêæùúàùõæsubscript‚Ñéùë°subscriptùíôùë°subscript‚Ñéùë°subscriptùíôùë°superscriptnormsubscriptùíàùë°2ùõæsubscript‚Ñéùë°subscriptùíôùë°subscriptùúÇùë°subscriptsuperscript‚Ñé2ùë°subscriptùíôùë°\min\left(\frac{h^{\frac{1-\nu}{1+\nu}}_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})}{K_{\nu}},% \gamma\right)h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})\leq\min\left(\frac{h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}% _{t})}{\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|^{2}},\gamma\right)h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})=\eta% _{t}h^{2}_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})~{}.roman_min ( divide start_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 - italic_ŒΩ end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_ŒΩ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_K start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ŒΩ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG , italic_Œ≥ ) italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚â§ roman_min ( divide start_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG , italic_Œ≥ ) italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) = italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) .

As before, we lower bound the minimum with the convex function B‚Å¢(x)=x21+ŒΩx1‚àíŒΩ1+ŒΩ+Œ≥‚Å¢KŒΩùêµùë•superscriptùë•21ùúàsuperscriptùë•1ùúà1ùúàùõæsubscriptùêæùúàB(x)=\frac{x^{\frac{2}{1+\nu}}}{x^{\frac{1-\nu}{1+\nu}}+\gamma K_{\nu}}italic_B ( italic_x ) = divide start_ARG italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_ŒΩ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 - italic_ŒΩ end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_ŒΩ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_Œ≥ italic_K start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ŒΩ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG:

min‚Å°(ht1‚àíŒΩ1+ŒΩ‚Å¢(ùíôt)KŒΩ,Œ≥)‚Å¢ht‚Å¢(ùíôt)‚â•Œ≥‚Å¢ht21+ŒΩ‚Å¢(ùíôt)ht1‚àíŒΩ1+ŒΩ‚Å¢(ùíôt)+Œ≥‚Å¢KŒΩ=Œ≥‚Å¢B‚Å¢(ht‚Å¢(ùíôt)).subscriptsuperscript‚Ñé1ùúà1ùúàùë°subscriptùíôùë°subscriptùêæùúàùõæsubscript‚Ñéùë°subscriptùíôùë°ùõæsubscriptsuperscript‚Ñé21ùúàùë°subscriptùíôùë°subscriptsuperscript‚Ñé1ùúà1ùúàùë°subscriptùíôùë°ùõæsubscriptùêæùúàùõæùêµsubscript‚Ñéùë°subscriptùíôùë°\min\left(\frac{h^{\frac{1-\nu}{1+\nu}}_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})}{K_{\nu}},% \gamma\right)h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})\geq\frac{\gamma h^{\frac{2}{1+\nu}}_{t}% (\boldsymbol{x}_{t})}{h^{\frac{1-\nu}{1+\nu}}_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})+\gamma K% _{\nu}}=\gamma B(h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t}))~{}.roman_min ( divide start_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 - italic_ŒΩ end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_ŒΩ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_K start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ŒΩ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG , italic_Œ≥ ) italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ‚â• divide start_ARG italic_Œ≥ italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_ŒΩ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 - italic_ŒΩ end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_ŒΩ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + italic_Œ≥ italic_K start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ŒΩ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG = italic_Œ≥ italic_B ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) .

As before, this allows us to use Jensen‚Äôs inequality:

B‚Å¢(1T‚Å¢‚àët=1Tht‚Å¢(ùíôt))ùêµ1ùëásuperscriptsubscriptùë°1ùëásubscript‚Ñéùë°subscriptùíôùë°\displaystyle B\left(\frac{1}{T}\sum_{t=1}^{T}h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})\right)italic_B ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_T end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) ‚â§1T‚Å¢‚àët=1TB‚Å¢(ht‚Å¢(ùíôt))‚â§‚Äñùíô1‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2Œ≥‚Å¢T+2T‚Å¢‚àët=1Tht‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ).absent1ùëásuperscriptsubscriptùë°1ùëáùêµsubscript‚Ñéùë°subscriptùíôùë°superscriptnormsubscriptùíô1superscriptùíô‚ãÜ2ùõæùëá2ùëásuperscriptsubscriptùë°1ùëásubscript‚Ñéùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜ\displaystyle\leq\frac{1}{T}\sum_{t=1}^{T}B(h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t}))\leq% \frac{\|\boldsymbol{x}_{1}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}}{\gamma T}+\frac{2}{T}% \sum_{t=1}^{T}h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})~{}.‚â§ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_T end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) ‚â§ divide start_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œ≥ italic_T end_ARG + divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_T end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) .

For simplicity of calculations, we now lower bound B‚Å¢(x)ùêµùë•B(x)italic_B ( italic_x ),

C‚Å¢(x)‚âî0.5‚Å¢min‚Å°(x,x21+ŒΩŒ≥‚Å¢KŒΩ)=x21+ŒΩ2‚Å¢max‚Å°{x1‚àíŒΩ1+ŒΩ,Œ≥‚Å¢KŒΩ}‚â§B‚Å¢(x).‚âîùê∂ùë•0.5ùë•superscriptùë•21ùúàùõæsubscriptùêæùúàsuperscriptùë•21ùúà2superscriptùë•1ùúà1ùúàùõæsubscriptùêæùúàùêµùë•\displaystyle C(x)\coloneqq 0.5\min\left(x,\frac{x^{\frac{2}{1+\nu}}}{\gamma K% _{\nu}}\right)=\frac{x^{\frac{2}{1+\nu}}}{2\max\{x^{\frac{1-\nu}{1+\nu}},% \gamma K_{\nu}\}}\leq B(x).italic_C ( italic_x ) ‚âî 0.5 roman_min ( italic_x , divide start_ARG italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_ŒΩ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œ≥ italic_K start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ŒΩ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ) = divide start_ARG italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_ŒΩ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 roman_max { italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 - italic_ŒΩ end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_ŒΩ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , italic_Œ≥ italic_K start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ŒΩ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT } end_ARG ‚â§ italic_B ( italic_x ) .

Note that C‚Å¢(x)ùê∂ùë•C(x)italic_C ( italic_x ) is invertible and its inverse is

C‚àí1‚Å¢(y)superscriptùê∂1ùë¶\displaystyle C^{-1}(y)italic_C start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_y ) ={2‚Å¢y,¬†if¬†‚Å¢y‚â•(Œ≥‚Å¢KŒΩ)1+ŒΩ1‚àíŒΩ(2‚Å¢Œ≥‚Å¢KŒΩ‚Å¢y)1+ŒΩ2,¬†if¬†‚Å¢y<(Œ≥‚Å¢KŒΩ)1+ŒΩ1‚àíŒΩabsentcases2ùë¶¬†if¬†ùë¶superscriptùõæsubscriptùêæùúà1ùúà1ùúàsuperscript2ùõæsubscriptùêæùúàùë¶1ùúà2¬†if¬†ùë¶superscriptùõæsubscriptùêæùúà1ùúà1ùúà\displaystyle=\begin{cases}2y,&\text{ if }y\geq(\gamma K_{\nu})^{\frac{1+\nu}{% 1-\nu}}\\ (2\gamma K_{\nu}y)^{\frac{1+\nu}{2}},&\text{ if }y<(\gamma K_{\nu})^{\frac{1+% \nu}{1-\nu}}\end{cases}= { start_ROW start_CELL 2 italic_y , end_CELL start_CELL if italic_y ‚â• ( italic_Œ≥ italic_K start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ŒΩ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 + italic_ŒΩ end_ARG start_ARG 1 - italic_ŒΩ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_CELL end_ROW start_ROW start_CELL ( 2 italic_Œ≥ italic_K start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ŒΩ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_y ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 + italic_ŒΩ end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , end_CELL start_CELL if italic_y < ( italic_Œ≥ italic_K start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ŒΩ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 + italic_ŒΩ end_ARG start_ARG 1 - italic_ŒΩ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_CELL end_ROW
‚â§2‚Å¢y+(2‚Å¢Œ≥‚Å¢KŒΩ‚Å¢y)1+ŒΩ2absent2ùë¶superscript2ùõæsubscriptùêæùúàùë¶1ùúà2\displaystyle\leq 2y+(2\gamma K_{\nu}y)^{\frac{1+\nu}{2}}‚â§ 2 italic_y + ( 2 italic_Œ≥ italic_K start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ŒΩ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_y ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 + italic_ŒΩ end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=2‚Å¢y+LŒΩ‚Å¢(2‚Å¢Œ≥‚Å¢y)1+ŒΩ2‚Å¢(1+1ŒΩ)ŒΩ.absent2ùë¶subscriptùêøùúàsuperscript2ùõæùë¶1ùúà2superscript11ùúàùúà\displaystyle=2y+L_{\nu}(2\gamma y)^{\frac{1+\nu}{2}}\left(1+\frac{1}{\nu}% \right)^{\nu}~{}.= 2 italic_y + italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ŒΩ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( 2 italic_Œ≥ italic_y ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 + italic_ŒΩ end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_ŒΩ end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_ŒΩ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT .

Taking expectations and using Jensen‚Äôs inequality gives the stated bound. ‚àé

Appendix E Proofs for Section¬†6

Lemma 4.

Let f:‚Ñùn‚Üí‚Ñù+:ùëì‚Üísuperscript‚Ñùùëõsuperscript‚Ñùf:\mathbb{R}^{n}\to\mathbb{R}^{+}italic_f : blackboard_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Üí blackboard_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT where f‚ãÜ=infùê±f‚Å¢(ùê±)superscriptùëì‚ãÜsubscriptinfimumùê±ùëìùê±f^{\star}=\inf_{\boldsymbol{x}}f(\boldsymbol{x})italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = roman_inf start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_f ( bold_italic_x ). Then for any c‚â•0ùëê0c\geq 0italic_c ‚â• 0 the following are equivalent:

  • ‚Ä¢

    f‚Å¢(ùíô)‚àíf‚ãÜ<c‚Å¢f‚ãÜùëìùíôsuperscriptùëì‚ãÜùëêsuperscriptùëì‚ãÜf(\boldsymbol{x})-f^{\star}<cf^{\star}italic_f ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT < italic_c italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT,

  • ‚Ä¢

    f‚Å¢(ùíô)‚àíf‚ãÜ<cc+1‚Å¢f‚Å¢(ùíô)ùëìùíôsuperscriptùëì‚ãÜùëêùëê1ùëìùíôf(\boldsymbol{x})-f^{\star}<\frac{c}{c+1}f(\boldsymbol{x})italic_f ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT < divide start_ARG italic_c end_ARG start_ARG italic_c + 1 end_ARG italic_f ( bold_italic_x ).

Proof.
f‚Å¢(ùíô)‚àíf‚ãÜ<c‚Å¢f‚ãÜùëìùíôsuperscriptùëì‚ãÜùëêsuperscriptùëì‚ãÜ\displaystyle f(\boldsymbol{x})-f^{\star}<cf^{\star}italic_f ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT < italic_c italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚áîf‚Å¢(ùíô)<(c+1)‚Å¢f‚ãÜ‚áîabsentùëìùíôùëê1superscriptùëì‚ãÜ\displaystyle\Leftrightarrow f(\boldsymbol{x})<(c+1)f^{\star}‚áî italic_f ( bold_italic_x ) < ( italic_c + 1 ) italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
‚áîf‚Å¢(ùíô)(c+1)<f‚ãÜ‚áîabsentùëìùíôùëê1superscriptùëì‚ãÜ\displaystyle\Leftrightarrow\frac{f(\boldsymbol{x})}{(c+1)}<f^{\star}‚áî divide start_ARG italic_f ( bold_italic_x ) end_ARG start_ARG ( italic_c + 1 ) end_ARG < italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
‚áîf‚Å¢(ùíô)‚àíf‚ãÜ<(1‚àí1c+1)‚Å¢f‚Å¢(ùíô)=cc+1‚Å¢f‚Å¢(ùíô).‚àé‚áîabsentùëìùíôsuperscriptùëì‚ãÜ11ùëê1ùëìùíôùëêùëê1ùëìùíô\displaystyle\Leftrightarrow f(\boldsymbol{x})-f^{\star}<\left(1-\frac{1}{c+1}% \right)f(\boldsymbol{x})=\frac{c}{c+1}f(\boldsymbol{x})~{}.\qed‚áî italic_f ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT < ( 1 - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_c + 1 end_ARG ) italic_f ( bold_italic_x ) = divide start_ARG italic_c end_ARG start_ARG italic_c + 1 end_ARG italic_f ( bold_italic_x ) . italic_‚àé
Proposition 1.

Suppose h‚Ñéhitalic_h is convex, strictly positive, LùêøLitalic_L-self-bounded, and satisfies the quadratic growth condition h‚Å¢(ùê±)‚àíh‚ãÜ‚â•Œº2‚Å¢‚Äñùê±‚àíùê±‚ãÜ‚Äñ2‚Ñéùê±superscript‚Ñé‚ãÜùúá2superscriptnormùê±superscriptùê±‚ãÜ2h(\boldsymbol{x})-h^{\star}\geq\frac{\mu}{2}\|\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}^{% \star}\|^{2}italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â• divide start_ARG italic_Œº end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT, where ùê±‚ãÜ=arg‚Å°minùê±‚Å°h‚Å¢(ùê±)superscriptùê±‚ãÜsubscriptùê±‚Ñéùê±\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}=\arg\min_{\boldsymbol{x}}h(\boldsymbol{x})bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = roman_arg roman_min start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) is the only fixed point of T¬†(6). Then for any point ùê±‚ààS={ùê≤:h‚Å¢(ùê≤)‚àíh‚ãÜ<h‚ãÜ‚Å¢Œº8‚Å¢L‚àíŒº}ùê±ùëÜconditional-setùê≤‚Ñéùê≤superscript‚Ñé‚ãÜsuperscript‚Ñé‚ãÜùúá8ùêøùúá\boldsymbol{x}\in S=\{\boldsymbol{y}:h(\boldsymbol{y})-h^{\star}<h^{\star}% \frac{\mu}{8L-\mu}\}bold_italic_x ‚àà italic_S = { bold_italic_y : italic_h ( bold_italic_y ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT < italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_Œº end_ARG start_ARG 8 italic_L - italic_Œº end_ARG } we have

‚ÄñT‚Å¢(ùíô)‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ>‚Äñùíô‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ.normùëáùíôsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜnormùíôsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ\|T(\boldsymbol{x})-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|>\|\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}^{% \star}\|~{}.‚à• italic_T ( bold_italic_x ) - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• > ‚à• bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• .
Proof.

Let ùíôtsubscriptùíôùë°\boldsymbol{x}_{t}bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT be in SùëÜSitalic_S then by definition of TùëáTitalic_T we have

12‚Å¢‚Äñùíôt+1‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ212superscriptnormsubscriptùíôùë°1superscriptùíô‚ãÜ2\displaystyle\frac{1}{2}\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t+1}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT =12‚Å¢‚Äñùíôt‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2‚àíŒ∑t‚Å¢‚ü®ùíàt,ùíôt‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚ü©+Œ∑t22‚Å¢‚Äñùíàt‚Äñ2absent12superscriptnormsubscriptùíôùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜ2subscriptùúÇùë°subscriptùíàùë°subscriptùíôùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜsuperscriptsubscriptùúÇùë°22superscriptnormsubscriptùíàùë°2\displaystyle=\frac{1}{2}\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}-% \eta_{t}\langle\boldsymbol{g}_{t},\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}% \rangle+\frac{\eta_{t}^{2}}{2}\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|^{2}= divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚ü® bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ü© + divide start_ARG italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
‚â•12‚Å¢‚Äñùíôt‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2‚àíŒ∑t‚Å¢‚Äñùíàt‚Äñ‚Å¢‚Äñùíôt‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ+Œ∑t22‚Å¢‚Äñùíàt‚Äñ2absent12superscriptnormsubscriptùíôùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜ2subscriptùúÇùë°normsubscriptùíàùë°normsubscriptùíôùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜsuperscriptsubscriptùúÇùë°22superscriptnormsubscriptùíàùë°2\displaystyle\geq\frac{1}{2}\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}-% \eta_{t}\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|+% \frac{\eta_{t}^{2}}{2}\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|^{2}‚â• divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• + divide start_ARG italic_Œ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=12‚Å¢‚Äñùíôt‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2‚àíh‚Å¢(ùíôt)‚Äñùíàt‚Äñ‚Å¢‚Äñùíôt‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ+h‚Å¢(ùíôt)22‚Å¢‚Äñùíàt‚Äñ2absent12superscriptnormsubscriptùíôùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜ2‚Ñésubscriptùíôùë°normsubscriptùíàùë°normsubscriptùíôùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜ‚Ñésuperscriptsubscriptùíôùë°22superscriptnormsubscriptùíàùë°2\displaystyle=\frac{1}{2}\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}-% \frac{h(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})}{\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|}\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-% \boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|+\frac{h(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})^{2}}{2\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t% }\|^{2}}= divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - divide start_ARG italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• end_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• + divide start_ARG italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 ‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG
=12‚Å¢‚Äñùíôt‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2+h‚Å¢(ùíôt)‚Äñùíàt‚Äñ‚Å¢[h‚Å¢(ùíôt)2‚Å¢‚Äñùíàt‚Äñ‚àí‚Äñùíôt‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ].absent12superscriptnormsubscriptùíôùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜ2‚Ñésubscriptùíôùë°normsubscriptùíàùë°delimited-[]‚Ñésubscriptùíôùë°2normsubscriptùíàùë°normsubscriptùíôùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜ\displaystyle=\frac{1}{2}\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}+% \frac{h(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})}{\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|}\left[\frac{h(\boldsymbol{% x}_{t})}{2\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|}-\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}% \|\right].= divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + divide start_ARG italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• end_ARG [ divide start_ARG italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 ‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• end_ARG - ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• ] .

If h‚Å¢(ùíôt)‚àíh‚ãÜ<h‚ãÜ‚Å¢Œº8‚Å¢L‚àíŒº‚Ñésubscriptùíôùë°superscript‚Ñé‚ãÜsuperscript‚Ñé‚ãÜùúá8ùêøùúáh(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})-h^{\star}<h^{\star}\frac{\mu}{8L-\mu}italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT < italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_Œº end_ARG start_ARG 8 italic_L - italic_Œº end_ARG then we have by Lemma 4

h‚Å¢(ùíôt)>(Œº/(8‚Å¢L‚àíŒº)+1Œº/(8‚Å¢L‚àíŒº))‚Å¢(h‚Å¢(ùíôt)‚àíh‚ãÜ)=8‚Å¢LŒº‚Å¢(h‚Å¢(ùíôt)‚àíh‚ãÜ).‚Ñésubscriptùíôùë°ùúá8ùêøùúá1ùúá8ùêøùúá‚Ñésubscriptùíôùë°superscript‚Ñé‚ãÜ8ùêøùúá‚Ñésubscriptùíôùë°superscript‚Ñé‚ãÜ\displaystyle h(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})>\left(\frac{\nicefrac{{\mu}}{{(8L-\mu)}}+1% }{\nicefrac{{\mu}}{{(8L-\mu)}}}\right)(h(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})-h^{\star})=\frac{% 8L}{\mu}(h(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})-h^{\star})~{}.italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) > ( divide start_ARG / start_ARG italic_Œº end_ARG start_ARG ( 8 italic_L - italic_Œº ) end_ARG + 1 end_ARG start_ARG / start_ARG italic_Œº end_ARG start_ARG ( 8 italic_L - italic_Œº ) end_ARG end_ARG ) ( italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) = divide start_ARG 8 italic_L end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œº end_ARG ( italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) .

Consequently,

h‚Å¢(ùíôt)2‚Å¢‚Äñùíàt‚Äñ‚Ñésubscriptùíôùë°2normsubscriptùíàùë°\displaystyle\frac{h(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})}{2\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|}divide start_ARG italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 ‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• end_ARG >4‚Å¢LŒº‚Å¢(h‚Å¢(ùíôt)‚àíh‚Å¢(ùíô‚ãÜ))‚Äñùíàt‚Äñ‚â•2‚Å¢L‚Å¢‚Äñùíôt‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2‚Äñùíàt‚Äñ‚â•‚Äñùíôt‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ.absent4ùêøùúá‚Ñésubscriptùíôùë°‚Ñésuperscriptùíô‚ãÜnormsubscriptùíàùë°2ùêøsuperscriptnormsubscriptùíôùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜ2normsubscriptùíàùë°normsubscriptùíôùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜ\displaystyle>\frac{4L}{\mu}\frac{(h(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})-h(\boldsymbol{x}^{% \star}))}{\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|}\geq 2L\frac{\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol% {x}^{\star}\|^{2}}{\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|}\geq\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol% {x}^{\star}\|~{}.> divide start_ARG 4 italic_L end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œº end_ARG divide start_ARG ( italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ) end_ARG start_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• end_ARG ‚â• 2 italic_L divide start_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• end_ARG ‚â• ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• .

Where the last inequality follows from h‚Ñéhitalic_h being self-bounded and convex,

12‚Å¢L‚Å¢‚Äñùíàt‚Äñ2‚â§h‚Å¢(ùíôt)‚àíh‚ãÜ‚â§‚ü®ùíàt,ùíôt‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚ü©‚â§‚Äñùíàt‚Äñ‚Å¢‚Äñùíôt‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ.‚àé12ùêøsuperscriptnormsubscriptùíàùë°2‚Ñésubscriptùíôùë°superscript‚Ñé‚ãÜsubscriptùíàùë°subscriptùíôùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜnormsubscriptùíàùë°normsubscriptùíôùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜ\frac{1}{2L}\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|^{2}\leq h(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})-h^{\star}\leq% \langle\boldsymbol{g}_{t},\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\rangle\leq% \|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|~{}.\qeddivide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_L end_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â§ italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â§ ‚ü® bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ü© ‚â§ ‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• . italic_‚àé
Proposition 6.

Suppose h‚Ñéhitalic_h is convex, strictly positive, LùêøLitalic_L-Lipschitz, and has a Œºùúá\muitalic_Œº-sharp minimum h‚Å¢(ùê±)‚àíh‚ãÜ‚â•Œº‚Å¢‚Äñùê±‚àíùê±‚ãÜ‚Äñ‚Ñéùê±superscript‚Ñé‚ãÜùúánormùê±superscriptùê±‚ãÜh(\boldsymbol{x})-h^{\star}\geq\mu\|\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â• italic_Œº ‚à• bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à•, where ùê±‚ãÜ=arg‚Å°minùê±‚Å°h‚Å¢(ùê±)superscriptùê±‚ãÜsubscriptùê±‚Ñéùê±\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}=\arg\min_{\boldsymbol{x}}h(\boldsymbol{x})bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = roman_arg roman_min start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) is the only fixed point of T¬†(6). Then for any point ùê±‚ààS={ùê≤:ùê≤‚â†ùê±‚ãÜ,h‚Å¢(ùê≤)‚àíh‚ãÜ<h‚ãÜ‚Å¢Œº2‚Å¢L‚àíŒº}ùê±ùëÜconditional-setùê≤formulae-sequenceùê≤superscriptùê±‚ãÜ‚Ñéùê≤superscript‚Ñé‚ãÜsuperscript‚Ñé‚ãÜùúá2ùêøùúá\boldsymbol{x}\in S=\{\boldsymbol{y}:\boldsymbol{y}\neq\boldsymbol{x}^{\star},% h(\boldsymbol{y})-h^{\star}<h^{\star}\frac{\mu}{2L-\mu}\}bold_italic_x ‚àà italic_S = { bold_italic_y : bold_italic_y ‚â† bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , italic_h ( bold_italic_y ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT < italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_Œº end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_L - italic_Œº end_ARG } we have

‚ÄñT‚Å¢(ùíô)‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ>‚Äñùíô‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ.normùëáùíôsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜnormùíôsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ\|T(\boldsymbol{x})-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|>\|\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}^{% \star}\|~{}.‚à• italic_T ( bold_italic_x ) - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• > ‚à• bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• .
Proof.

Let ùíôt‚ààSsubscriptùíôùë°ùëÜ\boldsymbol{x}_{t}\in Sbold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚àà italic_S then by following similar steps to Lemma¬†1 we have

12‚Å¢‚Äñùíôt+1‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ212superscriptnormsubscriptùíôùë°1superscriptùíô‚ãÜ2\displaystyle\frac{1}{2}\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t+1}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â•12‚Å¢‚Äñùíôt‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2+h‚Å¢(ùíôt)‚Äñùíàt‚Äñ‚Å¢[h‚Å¢(ùíôt)2‚Å¢‚Äñùíàt‚Äñ‚àí‚Äñùíôt‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ].absent12superscriptnormsubscriptùíôùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜ2‚Ñésubscriptùíôùë°normsubscriptùíàùë°delimited-[]‚Ñésubscriptùíôùë°2normsubscriptùíàùë°normsubscriptùíôùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜ\displaystyle\geq\frac{1}{2}\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}+% \frac{h(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})}{\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|}\left[\frac{h(\boldsymbol{% x}_{t})}{2\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|}-\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}% \|\right]~{}.‚â• divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + divide start_ARG italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• end_ARG [ divide start_ARG italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 ‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• end_ARG - ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• ] .

By Lemma¬†4, we have

h‚Å¢(ùíôt)‚àíh‚ãÜ<h‚ãÜ‚Å¢Œº2‚Å¢L‚àíŒº‚Ñésubscriptùíôùë°superscript‚Ñé‚ãÜsuperscript‚Ñé‚ãÜùúá2ùêøùúá\displaystyle h(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})-h^{\star}<h^{\star}\frac{\mu}{2L-\mu}italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT < italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_Œº end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_L - italic_Œº end_ARG
‚áîh‚Å¢(ùíôt)>(Œº/(2‚Å¢L‚àíŒº)+1Œº/(2‚Å¢L‚àíŒº))‚Å¢(h‚Å¢(ùíôt)‚àíh‚ãÜ)=2‚Å¢LŒº‚Å¢(h‚Å¢(ùíôt)‚àíh‚ãÜ).‚áîabsent‚Ñésubscriptùíôùë°ùúá2ùêøùúá1ùúá2ùêøùúá‚Ñésubscriptùíôùë°superscript‚Ñé‚ãÜ2ùêøùúá‚Ñésubscriptùíôùë°superscript‚Ñé‚ãÜ\displaystyle\Leftrightarrow h(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})>\left(\frac{\nicefrac{{\mu}% }{{(2L-\mu)}}+1}{\nicefrac{{\mu}}{{(2L-\mu)}}}\right)(h(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})-h^% {\star})=\frac{2L}{\mu}(h(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})-h^{\star})~{}.‚áî italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) > ( divide start_ARG / start_ARG italic_Œº end_ARG start_ARG ( 2 italic_L - italic_Œº ) end_ARG + 1 end_ARG start_ARG / start_ARG italic_Œº end_ARG start_ARG ( 2 italic_L - italic_Œº ) end_ARG end_ARG ) ( italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) = divide start_ARG 2 italic_L end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œº end_ARG ( italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) .

Therefore, by sharpness and Lipschitz property of h‚Ñéhitalic_h, we have

h‚Å¢(ùíôt)2‚Å¢‚Äñùíàt‚Äñ>L‚Å¢(h‚Å¢(ùíôt)‚àíh‚ãÜ)Œº‚Å¢‚Äñùíàt‚Äñ‚â•L‚Å¢‚Äñùíô‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ‚Äñùíàt‚Äñ‚â•‚Äñùíôt‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ.‚àé‚Ñésubscriptùíôùë°2normsubscriptùíàùë°ùêø‚Ñésubscriptùíôùë°superscript‚Ñé‚ãÜùúánormsubscriptùíàùë°ùêønormùíôsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜnormsubscriptùíàùë°normsubscriptùíôùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜ\frac{h(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})}{2\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|}>\frac{L(h(\boldsymbol{x}% _{t})-h^{\star})}{\mu\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|}\geq\frac{L\|\boldsymbol{x}-% \boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|}{\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|}\geq\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-% \boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|~{}.\qeddivide start_ARG italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 ‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• end_ARG > divide start_ARG italic_L ( italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œº ‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• end_ARG ‚â• divide start_ARG italic_L ‚à• bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• end_ARG start_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• end_ARG ‚â• ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• . italic_‚àé
Proposition 2 (Cycling and failure to converge).

There exists a strictly positive smooth and strongly convex function h‚Ñéhitalic_h, and initial point ùê±1subscriptùê±1\boldsymbol{x}_{1}bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT such that iterates from update (6) cycle and satisfy the inequality h‚Å¢(1t‚Å¢‚àëi=1tùê±i)‚àíh‚ãÜ‚â•Œ¥>0‚Ñé1ùë°superscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùë°subscriptùê±ùëñsuperscript‚Ñé‚ãÜùõø0h(\frac{1}{t}\sum_{i=1}^{t}\boldsymbol{x}_{i})-h^{\star}\geq\delta>0italic_h ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_t end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â• italic_Œ¥ > 0 for all tùë°titalic_t.

Proof.

The proof is constructive: consider h:‚Ñù‚Üí‚Ñù,h‚Å¢(x)=x2+1:‚Ñéformulae-sequence‚Üí‚Ñù‚Ñù‚Ñéùë•superscriptùë•21h:\mathbb{R}\to\mathbb{R},h(x)=x^{2}+1italic_h : blackboard_R ‚Üí blackboard_R , italic_h ( italic_x ) = italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + 1, so h‚ãÜ=1superscript‚Ñé‚ãÜ1h^{\star}=1italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = 1. Observe that the update is

xt+1=xt‚àíxt2+12‚Å¢xt=xt2‚àí12‚Å¢xt.subscriptùë•ùë°1subscriptùë•ùë°superscriptsubscriptùë•ùë°212subscriptùë•ùë°superscriptsubscriptùë•ùë°212subscriptùë•ùë°x_{t+1}=x_{t}-\frac{x_{t}^{2}+1}{2x_{t}}=\frac{x_{t}^{2}-1}{2x_{t}}~{}.italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - divide start_ARG italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG = divide start_ARG italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG .

Now, we want to choose x1subscriptùë•1x_{1}italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT so that we oscillate between 3 possible values.

Set x1=cot‚Å°Œ∏subscriptùë•1ùúÉx_{1}=\cot\thetaitalic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = roman_cot italic_Œ∏ where Œ∏ùúÉ\thetaitalic_Œ∏ has to be determined. The update becomes

x2=x12‚àí12‚Å¢x1=cot2‚Å°Œ∏‚àí12‚Å¢cot‚Å°Œ∏=cot‚Å°(2‚Å¢Œ∏),subscriptùë•2superscriptsubscriptùë•1212subscriptùë•1superscript2ùúÉ12ùúÉ2ùúÉx_{2}=\frac{x_{1}^{2}-1}{2x_{1}}=\frac{\cot^{2}\theta-1}{2\cot\theta}=\cot(2% \theta),italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = divide start_ARG italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG = divide start_ARG roman_cot start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Œ∏ - 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 roman_cot italic_Œ∏ end_ARG = roman_cot ( 2 italic_Œ∏ ) ,

where in the last equality we used the identity for cot\cotroman_cot. Hence, we have xt=cot‚Å°(2t‚Å¢Œ∏)subscriptùë•ùë°superscript2ùë°ùúÉx_{t}=\cot(2^{t}\theta)italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = roman_cot ( 2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Œ∏ ). Given that we want to oscillate between 3 values, we want xt+3=xtsubscriptùë•ùë°3subscriptùë•ùë°x_{t+3}=x_{t}italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t + 3 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, that is, cot‚Å°(2t+3‚Å¢Œ∏)=cot‚Å°(2t‚Å¢Œ∏)superscript2ùë°3ùúÉsuperscript2ùë°ùúÉ\cot(2^{t+3}\theta)=\cot(2^{t}\theta)roman_cot ( 2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_t + 3 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Œ∏ ) = roman_cot ( 2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Œ∏ ). We can achieve it if we select Œ∏=œÄ/7ùúÉùúã7\theta=\pi/7italic_Œ∏ = italic_œÄ / 7. Indeed, we have

x1subscriptùë•1\displaystyle x_{1}italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =cot‚Å°(œÄ/7)absentùúã7\displaystyle=\cot(\pi/7)= roman_cot ( italic_œÄ / 7 )
x2subscriptùë•2\displaystyle x_{2}italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =cot‚Å°(2‚Å¢œÄ/7)absent2ùúã7\displaystyle=\cot(2\pi/7)= roman_cot ( 2 italic_œÄ / 7 )
x3subscriptùë•3\displaystyle x_{3}italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 3 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =cot‚Å°(4‚Å¢œÄ/7)absent4ùúã7\displaystyle=\cot(4\pi/7)= roman_cot ( 4 italic_œÄ / 7 )
x5subscriptùë•5\displaystyle x_{5}italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 5 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =cot‚Å°(8‚Å¢œÄ/7)=cot‚Å°(œÄ+œÄ/7)=cot‚Å°(œÄ/7)=x1.absent8ùúã7ùúãùúã7ùúã7subscriptùë•1\displaystyle=\cot(8\pi/7)=\cot(\pi+\pi/7)=\cot(\pi/7)=x_{1}~{}.= roman_cot ( 8 italic_œÄ / 7 ) = roman_cot ( italic_œÄ + italic_œÄ / 7 ) = roman_cot ( italic_œÄ / 7 ) = italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

Finally, one can verify numerically that f‚Å¢(1t‚Å¢‚àëi=1txt)‚àíf‚ãÜ>0.77ùëì1ùë°superscriptsubscriptùëñ1ùë°subscriptùë•ùë°superscriptùëì‚ãÜ0.77f(\frac{1}{t}\sum_{i=1}^{t}x_{t})-f^{\star}>0.77italic_f ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_t end_ARG ‚àë start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT > 0.77. ‚àé

Lemma 5.

There exists subregions within the unstable regions in Propositions ¬†1 and ¬†6 where the stepsizes are upper bounded.

Proof.

By convexity of h‚Ñéhitalic_h we have h‚àíh‚ãÜ‚â§‚ü®ùíàt,ùíôt‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚ü©‚â§‚Äñùíàt‚Äñ‚Å¢‚Äñùíôt‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ‚Ñésuperscript‚Ñé‚ãÜsubscriptùíàùë°subscriptùíôùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜnormsubscriptùíàùë°normsubscriptùíôùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜh-h^{\star}\leq\langle\boldsymbol{g}_{t},\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{x}^{% \star}\rangle\leq\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{x}^{% \star}\|italic_h - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â§ ‚ü® bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ü© ‚â§ ‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à•, so ‚Äñùíàt‚Äñ‚â•h‚Å¢(ùíô)‚àíh‚ãÜ‚Äñùíôt‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñnormsubscriptùíàùë°‚Ñéùíôsuperscript‚Ñé‚ãÜnormsubscriptùíôùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜ\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|\geq\frac{h(\boldsymbol{x})-h^{\star}}{\|\boldsymbol{x}_% {t}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|}‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• ‚â• divide start_ARG italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• end_ARG. By assumption in Lemmas ¬†1 and ¬†6 the unstable region is S={ùíô:h‚Å¢(ùíô)‚àíh‚ãÜ<c‚Å¢h‚ãÜ}ùëÜconditional-setùíô‚Ñéùíôsuperscript‚Ñé‚ãÜùëêsuperscript‚Ñé‚ãÜS=\{\boldsymbol{x}:h(\boldsymbol{x})-h^{\star}<ch^{\star}\}italic_S = { bold_italic_x : italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT < italic_c italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT } where cùëêcitalic_c depends on the properties of h‚Ñéhitalic_h. Therefore, for ùíô‚ààSùíôùëÜ\boldsymbol{x}\in Sbold_italic_x ‚àà italic_S and denoting ùíà‚àà‚àÇh‚Å¢(ùíô)ùíà‚Ñéùíô\boldsymbol{g}\in\partial h(\boldsymbol{x})bold_italic_g ‚àà ‚àÇ italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) as any subgradient at ùíôùíô\boldsymbol{x}bold_italic_x, we have

h‚Å¢(ùíô)‚Äñùíà‚Äñ2‚Ñéùíôsuperscriptnormùíà2\displaystyle\frac{h(\boldsymbol{x})}{\|\boldsymbol{g}\|^{2}}divide start_ARG italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) end_ARG start_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_g ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ‚â§h‚Å¢(ùíô)‚Å¢‚Äñùíô‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2(h‚Å¢(ùíô)‚àíh‚ãÜ)2<(c+1)‚Å¢h‚ãÜ‚Å¢‚Äñùíô‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2(h‚Å¢(ùíô)‚àíh‚ãÜ)2.absent‚Ñéùíôsuperscriptnormùíôsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ2superscript‚Ñéùíôsuperscript‚Ñé‚ãÜ2ùëê1superscript‚Ñé‚ãÜsuperscriptnormùíôsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ2superscript‚Ñéùíôsuperscript‚Ñé‚ãÜ2\displaystyle\leq\frac{h(\boldsymbol{x})\|\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star% }\|^{2}}{(h(\boldsymbol{x})-h^{\star})^{2}}<\frac{(c+1)h^{\star}\|\boldsymbol{% x}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}}{(h(\boldsymbol{x})-h^{\star})^{2}}~{}.‚â§ divide start_ARG italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) ‚à• bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG ( italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG < divide start_ARG ( italic_c + 1 ) italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG ( italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG .

If h‚Ñéhitalic_h has a sharp minimum, h‚Å¢(ùíô)‚àíh‚ãÜ‚â•Œº‚Å¢‚Äñùíô‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ‚Ñéùíôsuperscript‚Ñé‚ãÜùúánormùíôsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜh(\boldsymbol{x})-h^{\star}\geq\mu\|\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â• italic_Œº ‚à• bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à•, then we have h‚Å¢(ùíô)‚Äñùíàt‚Äñ2<c+1Œº2‚Å¢h‚ãÜ‚Ñéùíôsuperscriptnormsubscriptùíàùë°2ùëê1superscriptùúá2superscript‚Ñé‚ãÜ\frac{h(\boldsymbol{x})}{\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|^{2}}<\frac{c+1}{\mu^{2}}h^{\star}divide start_ARG italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) end_ARG start_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG < divide start_ARG italic_c + 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œº start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT. Therefore, the stepsizes are always bounded within S.

Now consider the subregion Sk={ùíô:h‚Å¢(ùíô)‚àíh‚ãÜ<ck‚Å¢h‚ãÜ}subscriptùëÜùëòconditional-setùíô‚Ñéùíôsuperscript‚Ñé‚ãÜùëêùëòsuperscript‚Ñé‚ãÜS_{k}=\{\boldsymbol{x}:h(\boldsymbol{x})-h^{\star}<\frac{c}{k}h^{\star}\}italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = { bold_italic_x : italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT < divide start_ARG italic_c end_ARG start_ARG italic_k end_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT } for some k>1ùëò1k>1italic_k > 1. Consider ùíô‚ààS‚àñSkùíôùëÜsubscriptùëÜùëò\boldsymbol{x}\in S\setminus S_{k}bold_italic_x ‚àà italic_S ‚àñ italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, that is (1+ck)‚Å¢h‚àó‚â§h‚Å¢(ùíô)‚â§(1+c)‚Å¢h‚àó1ùëêùëòsuperscript‚Ñé‚àó‚Ñéùíô1ùëêsuperscript‚Ñé‚àó(1+\frac{c}{k})h^{\ast}\leq h(\boldsymbol{x})\leq(1+c)h^{\ast}( 1 + divide start_ARG italic_c end_ARG start_ARG italic_k end_ARG ) italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚àó end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â§ italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) ‚â§ ( 1 + italic_c ) italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚àó end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT. If h‚Ñéhitalic_h statisfies the quadratic growth condition h‚Å¢(ùíô)‚àíh‚ãÜ‚â•Œº2‚Å¢‚Äñùíô‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2‚Ñéùíôsuperscript‚Ñé‚ãÜùúá2superscriptnormùíôsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ2h(\boldsymbol{x})-h^{\star}\geq\frac{\mu}{2}\|\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}^{% \star}\|^{2}italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â• divide start_ARG italic_Œº end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT then

h‚Å¢(ùíô)‚Äñùíà‚Äñ2<(c+1)‚Å¢h‚ãÜ‚Å¢‚Äñùíô‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ2(h‚Å¢(ùíô)‚àíh‚ãÜ)2‚â§2‚Å¢(c+1)‚Å¢h‚ãÜŒº‚Å¢(h‚Å¢(ùíô)‚àíh‚ãÜ)‚â§2‚Å¢k‚Å¢(c+1)Œº‚Å¢c.‚Ñéùíôsuperscriptnormùíà2ùëê1superscript‚Ñé‚ãÜsuperscriptnormùíôsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ2superscript‚Ñéùíôsuperscript‚Ñé‚ãÜ22ùëê1superscript‚Ñé‚ãÜùúá‚Ñéùíôsuperscript‚Ñé‚ãÜ2ùëòùëê1ùúáùëê\displaystyle\frac{h(\boldsymbol{x})}{\|\boldsymbol{g}\|^{2}}<\frac{(c+1)h^{% \star}\|\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}}{(h(\boldsymbol{x})-h^{% \star})^{2}}\leq\frac{2(c+1)h^{\star}}{\mu(h(\boldsymbol{x})-h^{\star})}\leq% \frac{2k(c+1)}{\mu c}~{}.divide start_ARG italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) end_ARG start_ARG ‚à• bold_italic_g ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG < divide start_ARG ( italic_c + 1 ) italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG ( italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ‚â§ divide start_ARG 2 ( italic_c + 1 ) italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œº ( italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG ‚â§ divide start_ARG 2 italic_k ( italic_c + 1 ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_Œº italic_c end_ARG . (9)

Where the last inequality follows since ùíô‚àâSkùíôsubscriptùëÜùëò\boldsymbol{x}\notin S_{k}bold_italic_x ‚àâ italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. Therefore, stepsize is bounded within S‚àñSkùëÜsubscriptùëÜùëòS\setminus S_{k}italic_S ‚àñ italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, and grows as we increase kùëòkitalic_k. ‚àé

Lemma 6.

Let T:‚Ñùn‚Üí‚Ñùn:ùëá‚Üísuperscript‚Ñùùëõsuperscript‚ÑùùëõT:\mathbb{R}^{n}\to\mathbb{R}^{n}italic_T : blackboard_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Üí blackboard_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT with a unique fixed point ùê±‚ãÜsuperscriptùê±‚ãÜ\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT. If ùê±‚ãÜsuperscriptùê±‚ãÜ\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT is unstable, that is, there exists Œ¥ùõø\deltaitalic_Œ¥ such that ùê±‚â†ùê±‚ãÜùê±superscriptùê±‚ãÜ\boldsymbol{x}\neq\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}bold_italic_x ‚â† bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT and ‚Äñùê±‚àíùê±‚ãÜ‚Äñ‚â§Œ¥normùê±superscriptùê±‚ãÜùõø\|\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|\leq\delta‚à• bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• ‚â§ italic_Œ¥, then ‚ÄñT‚Å¢(ùê±)‚àíùê±‚ãÜ‚Äñ>‚Äñùê±‚àíùê±‚ãÜ‚Äñnormùëáùê±superscriptùê±‚ãÜnormùê±superscriptùê±‚ãÜ\|T(\boldsymbol{x})-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|>\|\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}^{% \star}\|‚à• italic_T ( bold_italic_x ) - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• > ‚à• bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à•. Define T‚àí1superscriptùëá1T^{-1}italic_T start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over a set S‚äÜ‚ÑùnùëÜsuperscript‚ÑùùëõS\subseteq\mathbb{R}^{n}italic_S ‚äÜ blackboard_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT as T‚àí1‚Å¢(S)={ùê±:T‚Å¢(ùê±)‚ààS}superscriptùëá1ùëÜconditional-setùê±ùëáùê±ùëÜT^{-1}(S)=\{\boldsymbol{x}:T(\boldsymbol{x})\in S\}italic_T start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_S ) = { bold_italic_x : italic_T ( bold_italic_x ) ‚àà italic_S }. If T‚àík‚Å¢({ùê±‚ãÜ})superscriptùëáùëòsuperscriptùê±‚ãÜT^{-k}(\{\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\})italic_T start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( { bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT } ) is of measure zero for any kùëòkitalic_k, then

P‚Å¢(limt‚Üí‚àûùíôt=ùíô‚ãÜ)=0.ùëÉsubscript‚Üíùë°subscriptùíôùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜ0P\left(\lim_{t\to\infty}\boldsymbol{x}_{t}=\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\right)=0~{}.italic_P ( roman_lim start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ‚Üí ‚àû end_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) = 0 .

In other words, the set of initializations that can converge to the optimal solution has measure zero.

Proof.

We divide ‚Ñùnsuperscript‚Ñùùëõ\mathbb{R}^{n}blackboard_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT into two sets, S=‚ãÉk=1‚àûT‚àík‚Å¢({ùíô‚ãÜ})ùëÜsuperscriptsubscriptùëò1superscriptùëáùëòsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜS=\bigcup_{k=1}^{\infty}T^{-k}(\{\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\})italic_S = ‚ãÉ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚àû end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( { bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT } ), and its compliment ScsuperscriptùëÜùëêS^{c}italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_c end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT. SùëÜSitalic_S represents the points that can exactly reach the unique minimizer ùíô‚ãÜsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT. If Tk‚Å¢({ùíô‚ãÜ})superscriptùëáùëòsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜT^{k}(\{\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\})italic_T start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( { bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT } ) is a null set for every kùëòkitalic_k then so is SùëÜSitalic_S since the countable union of null sets is a null set.

Now we show that for all initializations in ùíô1‚ààScsubscriptùíô1superscriptùëÜùëê\boldsymbol{x}_{1}\in S^{c}bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚àà italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_c end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT, ùíô1subscriptùíô1\boldsymbol{x}_{1}bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT cannot converge to ùíô‚ãÜsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT. Suppose the contrary, limt‚Üí‚àûùíôt=ùíô‚ãÜsubscript‚Üíùë°subscriptùíôùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜ\lim_{t\to\infty}\boldsymbol{x}_{t}=\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}roman_lim start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ‚Üí ‚àû end_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT. Let B={ùíö:ùíö‚â†ùíô‚ãÜ,‚Äñùíô‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ‚â§Œ¥}ùêµconditional-setùíöformulae-sequenceùíösuperscriptùíô‚ãÜnormùíôsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜùõøB=\{\boldsymbol{y}:\boldsymbol{y}\neq\boldsymbol{x}^{\star},\|\boldsymbol{x}-% \boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|\leq\delta\}italic_B = { bold_italic_y : bold_italic_y ‚â† bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , ‚à• bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• ‚â§ italic_Œ¥ }. Since ùíôt‚Üíùíô‚ãÜ‚Üísubscriptùíôùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜ\boldsymbol{x}_{t}\to\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚Üí bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT there exists a step nùëõnitalic_n where {ùíôt}t‚â•n‚äÜBsubscriptsubscriptùíôùë°ùë°ùëõùêµ\{\boldsymbol{x}_{t}\}_{t\geq n}\subseteq B{ bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT } start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ‚â• italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚äÜ italic_B. Similarly, there exists n‚Ä≤‚â•nsuperscriptùëõ‚Ä≤ùëõn^{\prime}\geq nitalic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚â• italic_n where ‚Äñùíôt‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ‚â§‚Äñùíôn‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñnormsubscriptùíôùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜnormsubscriptùíôùëõsuperscriptùíô‚ãÜ\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|\leq\|\boldsymbol{x}_{n}-% \boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• ‚â§ ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• for all t‚â•n‚Ä≤ùë°superscriptùëõ‚Ä≤t\geq n^{\prime}italic_t ‚â• italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT. This is a contradiction as we have that ‚Äñùíôn‚àíx‚ãÜ‚Äñ<‚Äñùíôn+1‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñ<‚ãØ<‚Äñùíôn‚Ä≤‚àíùíô‚ãÜ‚Äñnormsubscriptùíôùëõsuperscriptùë•‚ãÜnormsubscriptùíôùëõ1superscriptùíô‚ãÜ‚ãØnormsubscriptùíôsuperscriptùëõ‚Ä≤superscriptùíô‚ãÜ\|\boldsymbol{x}_{n}-x^{\star}\|<\|\boldsymbol{x}_{n+1}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}% \|<\cdots<\|\boldsymbol{x}_{n^{\prime}}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• < ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à• < ‚ãØ < ‚à• bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚Ä≤ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚à•. Therefore, the initializations that allow for ùíôt‚Üíùíô‚ãÜ‚Üísubscriptùíôùë°superscriptùíô‚ãÜ\boldsymbol{x}_{t}\to\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ‚Üí bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ‚ãÜ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT coincide exactly with the null set SùëÜSitalic_S. ‚àé
